Request      

POST api/admin/vendors/{id}

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: multipart/form-data

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

id   integer   

The ID of the vendor. Example: 1

vendor   integer   

The ID of the vendor to update. Example: 12

Body Parameters

user_id   integer  optional  

optional Updated user ID for vendor ownership. Only admins can change this. Must be a valid, existing user. Example: 67

name   string  optional  

optional Updated vendor business name. Will be used for public display and branding. Example: TechCraft Solutions International Ltd

description   string  optional  

optional Updated business description. Maximum 1000 characters. Example: Global leader in innovative technology solutions. We specialize in enterprise software development, cloud migration services, AI integration, and digital transformation consulting with over 15 years of proven industry experience.

logo   file  optional  

optional New logo file to replace existing one. Must be an image (JPG, JPEG, PNG) with maximum size of 2MB. Will completely replace the current logo. Example: /tmp/php0L1HWN

Permanently delete a vendor profile

requires authentication

Permanently remove a vendor profile from the marketplace along with their associated media assets. This action is irreversible and will completely remove the vendor's business profile from the system. Exercise extreme caution when deleting vendors as this may affect product listings, order history, customer relationships, and marketplace analytics. Consider deactivating vendor accounts instead of deletion for business continuity and data integrity.

Warning: This permanently deletes the vendor profile and all associated media files. Product listings, order history, and customer relationships may be affected. Ensure this action is intentional and properly authorized by business stakeholders.

Example request:
curl --request DELETE \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/vendors/1" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/vendors/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "DELETE",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/vendors/1';
$response = $client->delete(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/vendors/1'
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('DELETE', url, headers=headers)
response.json()

Example response (200, Vendor deleted successfully):


{
    "message": "Vendor deleted successfully."
}

Example response (403, Insufficient permissions):


{
    "message": "You do not have the required permissions."
}

Example response (404, Vendor not found):


{
    "message": "No query results for model [App\\Models\\Vendor] 999"
}

Example response (409, Vendor has active products):


{
    "message": "Cannot delete vendor with active product listings. Please remove or transfer all products first."
}

Example response (409, Vendor has pending orders):


{
    "message": "Cannot delete vendor with pending or recent orders. Please resolve all order-related activities first."
}

Example response (422, Vendor has dependencies):


{
    "message": "This vendor has active marketplace dependencies and cannot be deleted. Please contact system administrator."
}

Example response (422, Protected vendor account):


{
    "message": "Cannot delete featured or premium vendor accounts without special authorization."
}

Example response (500, Deletion failed):


{
    "message": "An error occurred while deleting the vendor profile and associated media files."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

DELETE api/admin/vendors/{id}

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

id   integer   

The ID of the vendor. Example: 1

vendor   integer   

The ID of the vendor to permanently delete. Example: 12

Product Management

Retrieve a paginated list of products with enhanced search

requires authentication

Get a comprehensive paginated list of all products in the system with advanced filtering capabilities. This endpoint provides administrators with complete product information including variants, media, categories, tags, vendor details, relevance scoring, and faceted search results.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/products?filter[]=architecto&filter%5Bsearch%5D=wireless+bluetooth+headphones&filter%5Bname%5D=wireless&filter%5Bprice%5D=10.00%2C50.00&filter%5BpriceRanges%5D=0-25%2C50-100%2C200-500&filter%5Bcategory%5D=5%2C12%2C18&filter%5Bavailability%5D=in_stock&filter%5Bvendors%5D=2%2C5%2C8&filter%5Bvendor%5D=apple&filter%5Btags%5D=3%2C7%2C12&filter%5Battributes%5D=color%3Ared%2Csize%3Alarge&filter%5Bstatus%5D=Active&filter%5Bquantity%5D=10%2C100&filter%5Bcreated_at%5D=2025-01-01%2C2025-01-31&filter%5Bupdated_at%5D=2025-01-01%2C2025-01-31&filter%5Binclude%5D=vendor%2Cvariants%2Ccategory&page=2&per_page=24&sort=-relevance%2Cprice&diversify=1&explain=1" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"filter\": {
        \"name\": \"b\",
        \"search\": \"n\",
        \"price\": \"9,3.1)\",
        \"priceRanges\": \"-1.42)-3268)\",
        \"category\": \"9,31\",
        \"categories\": \"9,31\",
        \"quantity\": \"64\",
        \"availability\": \"low_stock\",
        \"vendors\": \"9,31\",
        \"vendor\": \"i\",
        \"brand\": \"k\",
        \"brands\": \"9,31\",
        \"tags\": \"9,31\",
        \"tag_logic\": \"AND\",
        \"attributes\": \"_JK:AI\",
        \"color\": \"k\",
        \"colors\": \"dLJnIk\",
        \"size\": \"h\",
        \"sizes\": \"DDz1Ys\",
        \"material\": \"h\",
        \"status\": \"w\",
        \"created_at\": \"2559-31-42\",
        \"updated_at\": \"2559-31-42\",
        \"include\": \"uw,pw,lvq,wrsitc,pscqld,zsnrwt,ujwv\"
    },
    \"page\": 4,
    \"per_page\": 9,
    \"sort\": \"y8p,Bm,-dp,-Zm,-GH\",
    \"diversify\": false,
    \"explain\": true,
    \"facets\": true,
    \"highlight\": true,
    \"personalize\": false,
    \"typo_tolerance\": true,
    \"exact_match\": true,
    \"boost_new_products\": true,
    \"boost_in_stock\": false
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/products"
);

const params = {
    "filter[0]": "architecto",
    "filter[search]": "wireless bluetooth headphones",
    "filter[name]": "wireless",
    "filter[price]": "10.00,50.00",
    "filter[priceRanges]": "0-25,50-100,200-500",
    "filter[category]": "5,12,18",
    "filter[availability]": "in_stock",
    "filter[vendors]": "2,5,8",
    "filter[vendor]": "apple",
    "filter[tags]": "3,7,12",
    "filter[attributes]": "color:red,size:large",
    "filter[status]": "Active",
    "filter[quantity]": "10,100",
    "filter[created_at]": "2025-01-01,2025-01-31",
    "filter[updated_at]": "2025-01-01,2025-01-31",
    "filter[include]": "vendor,variants,category",
    "page": "2",
    "per_page": "24",
    "sort": "-relevance,price",
    "diversify": "1",
    "explain": "1",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "filter": {
        "name": "b",
        "search": "n",
        "price": "9,3.1)",
        "priceRanges": "-1.42)-3268)",
        "category": "9,31",
        "categories": "9,31",
        "quantity": "64",
        "availability": "low_stock",
        "vendors": "9,31",
        "vendor": "i",
        "brand": "k",
        "brands": "9,31",
        "tags": "9,31",
        "tag_logic": "AND",
        "attributes": "_JK:AI",
        "color": "k",
        "colors": "dLJnIk",
        "size": "h",
        "sizes": "DDz1Ys",
        "material": "h",
        "status": "w",
        "created_at": "2559-31-42",
        "updated_at": "2559-31-42",
        "include": "uw,pw,lvq,wrsitc,pscqld,zsnrwt,ujwv"
    },
    "page": 4,
    "per_page": 9,
    "sort": "y8p,Bm,-dp,-Zm,-GH",
    "diversify": false,
    "explain": true,
    "facets": true,
    "highlight": true,
    "personalize": false,
    "typo_tolerance": true,
    "exact_match": true,
    "boost_new_products": true,
    "boost_in_stock": false
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/products';
$response = $client->get(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'query' => [
            'filter[0]' => 'architecto',
            'filter[search]' => 'wireless bluetooth headphones',
            'filter[name]' => 'wireless',
            'filter[price]' => '10.00,50.00',
            'filter[priceRanges]' => '0-25,50-100,200-500',
            'filter[category]' => '5,12,18',
            'filter[availability]' => 'in_stock',
            'filter[vendors]' => '2,5,8',
            'filter[vendor]' => 'apple',
            'filter[tags]' => '3,7,12',
            'filter[attributes]' => 'color:red,size:large',
            'filter[status]' => 'Active',
            'filter[quantity]' => '10,100',
            'filter[created_at]' => '2025-01-01,2025-01-31',
            'filter[updated_at]' => '2025-01-01,2025-01-31',
            'filter[include]' => 'vendor,variants,category',
            'page' => '2',
            'per_page' => '24',
            'sort' => '-relevance,price',
            'diversify' => '1',
            'explain' => '1',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'filter' => [
                'name' => 'b',
                'search' => 'n',
                'price' => '9,3.1)',
                'priceRanges' => '-1.42)-3268)',
                'category' => '9,31',
                'categories' => '9,31',
                'quantity' => '64',
                'availability' => 'low_stock',
                'vendors' => '9,31',
                'vendor' => 'i',
                'brand' => 'k',
                'brands' => '9,31',
                'tags' => '9,31',
                'tag_logic' => 'AND',
                'attributes' => '_JK:AI',
                'color' => 'k',
                'colors' => 'dLJnIk',
                'size' => 'h',
                'sizes' => 'DDz1Ys',
                'material' => 'h',
                'status' => 'w',
                'created_at' => '2559-31-42',
                'updated_at' => '2559-31-42',
                'include' => 'uw,pw,lvq,wrsitc,pscqld,zsnrwt,ujwv',
            ],
            'page' => 4,
            'per_page' => 9,
            'sort' => 'y8p,Bm,-dp,-Zm,-GH',
            'diversify' => false,
            'explain' => true,
            'facets' => true,
            'highlight' => true,
            'personalize' => false,
            'typo_tolerance' => true,
            'exact_match' => true,
            'boost_new_products' => true,
            'boost_in_stock' => false,
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/products'
payload = {
    "filter": {
        "name": "b",
        "search": "n",
        "price": "9,3.1)",
        "priceRanges": "-1.42)-3268)",
        "category": "9,31",
        "categories": "9,31",
        "quantity": "64",
        "availability": "low_stock",
        "vendors": "9,31",
        "vendor": "i",
        "brand": "k",
        "brands": "9,31",
        "tags": "9,31",
        "tag_logic": "AND",
        "attributes": "_JK:AI",
        "color": "k",
        "colors": "dLJnIk",
        "size": "h",
        "sizes": "DDz1Ys",
        "material": "h",
        "status": "w",
        "created_at": "2559-31-42",
        "updated_at": "2559-31-42",
        "include": "uw,pw,lvq,wrsitc,pscqld,zsnrwt,ujwv"
    },
    "page": 4,
    "per_page": 9,
    "sort": "y8p,Bm,-dp,-Zm,-GH",
    "diversify": false,
    "explain": true,
    "facets": true,
    "highlight": true,
    "personalize": false,
    "typo_tolerance": true,
    "exact_match": true,
    "boost_new_products": true,
    "boost_in_stock": false
}
params = {
  'filter[0]': 'architecto',
  'filter[search]': 'wireless bluetooth headphones',
  'filter[name]': 'wireless',
  'filter[price]': '10.00,50.00',
  'filter[priceRanges]': '0-25,50-100,200-500',
  'filter[category]': '5,12,18',
  'filter[availability]': 'in_stock',
  'filter[vendors]': '2,5,8',
  'filter[vendor]': 'apple',
  'filter[tags]': '3,7,12',
  'filter[attributes]': 'color:red,size:large',
  'filter[status]': 'Active',
  'filter[quantity]': '10,100',
  'filter[created_at]': '2025-01-01,2025-01-31',
  'filter[updated_at]': '2025-01-01,2025-01-31',
  'filter[include]': 'vendor,variants,category',
  'page': '2',
  'per_page': '24',
  'sort': '-relevance,price',
  'diversify': '1',
  'explain': '1',
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('GET', url, headers=headers, json=payload, params=params)
response.json()

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/admin/products

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

filter   string[]  optional  

optional Array of filter parameters to narrow down results.

filter[search]   string  optional  

optional Advanced search across product names and descriptions with relevance scoring. Example: wireless bluetooth headphones

filter[name]   string  optional  

optional Filter products by name (partial match supported). Example: wireless

filter[price]   string  optional  

optional Filter by price range in pounds. Single value or comma-separated min,max. Example: 10.00,50.00

filter[priceRanges]   string  optional  

optional Multiple price ranges separated by commas. Example: 0-25,50-100,200-500

filter[category]   string  optional  

optional Filter by category ID(s) including child categories. Example: 5,12,18

filter[availability]   string  optional  

optional Filter by stock status. Options: in_stock, out_of_stock, low_stock, available. Example: in_stock

filter[vendors]   string  optional  

optional Filter by vendor ID(s). Example: 2,5,8

filter[vendor]   string  optional  

optional Filter by vendor name (partial match). Example: apple

filter[tags]   string  optional  

optional Filter by tag ID(s) with logic support. Example: 3,7,12

filter[attributes]   string  optional  

optional Filter by product attributes. Format: attribute:value,attribute:value. Example: color:red,size:large

filter[status]   string  optional  

optional Filter by product status. Example: Active

filter[quantity]   string  optional  

optional Filter by quantity range. Single value or min,max. Example: 10,100

filter[created_at]   string  optional  

optional Filter by creation date range (YYYY-MM-DD). Example: 2025-01-01,2025-01-31

filter[updated_at]   string  optional  

optional Filter by update date range (YYYY-MM-DD). Example: 2025-01-01,2025-01-31

filter[include]   string  optional  

optional Include related data. Options: vendor,variants,category,tags,media. Example: vendor,variants,category

page   integer  optional  

optional Page number for pagination. Default: 1. Example: 2

per_page   integer  optional  

optional Number of products per page (max 100). Default: 15. Example: 24

sort   string  optional  

optional Sort products. Prefix with '-' for descending. Available: name, price, quantity, created_at, updated_at, relevance. Example: -relevance,price

diversify   boolean  optional  

optional Apply result diversification to avoid too many similar products. Default: false. Example: true

explain   boolean  optional  

optional Include search explanations for debugging. Default: false. Example: true

Body Parameters

filter   object  optional  
name   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: b

search   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 500 characters. Example: n

price   string  optional  

Must match the regex /^\d+(.\d{1,2})?(,\d+(.\d{1,2})?)*$/. Example: 9,3.1)

priceRanges   string  optional  

Must match the regex /^(\d+(.\d{1,2})?-\d+(.\d{1,2})?)(,\d+(.\d{1,2})?-\d+(.\d{1,2})?)*$/. Example: -1.42)-3268)

category   string  optional  

Must match the regex /^(\d,?)+$/. Example: 9,31

categories   string  optional  

Must match the regex /^(\d,?)+$/. Example: 9,31

quantity   string  optional  

Must match the regex /^\d+(,\d+)?$/. Example: 64

availability   string  optional  

Example: low_stock

Must be one of:
  • in_stock
  • out_of_stock
  • low_stock
  • available
vendors   string  optional  

Must match the regex /^(\d,?)+$/. Example: 9,31

vendor   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: i

brand   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: k

brands   string  optional  

Must match the regex /^(\d,?)+$/. Example: 9,31

tags   string  optional  

Must match the regex /^(\d,?)+$/. Example: 9,31

tag_logic   string  optional  

Example: AND

Must be one of:
  • AND
  • OR
attributes   string  optional  

Must match the regex /^([a-zA-Z]+:[a-zA-Z0-9-\s]+)(,[a-zA-Z]+:[a-zA-Z0-9-\s]+)*$/. Example: _JK:AI

color   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 50 characters. Example: k

colors   string  optional  

Must match the regex /^([a-zA-Z]+,?)+$/. Example: dLJnIk

size   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 50 characters. Example: h

sizes   string  optional  

Must match the regex /^([a-zA-Z0-9]+,?)+$/. Example: DDz1Ys

material   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 100 characters. Example: h

status   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 50 characters. Example: w

created_at   string  optional  

Must match the regex /^\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}(,\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2})?$/. Example: 2559-31-42

updated_at   string  optional  

Must match the regex /^\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}(,\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2})?$/. Example: 2559-31-42

include   string  optional  

Must match the regex /^(\w+(,\w+)*)?$/. Example: uw,pw,lvq,wrsitc,pscqld,zsnrwt,ujwv

page   integer  optional  

Must be at least 1. Example: 4

per_page   integer  optional  

Must be at least 1. Must not be greater than 100. Example: 9

sort   string  optional  

Must match the regex /^(-?[a-zA-Z0-9]+)(,-?[a-zA-Z0-9]+)*$/. Example: y8p,Bm,-dp,-Zm,-GH

diversify   boolean  optional  

Example: false

explain   boolean  optional  

Example: true

facets   boolean  optional  

Example: true

highlight   boolean  optional  

Example: true

personalize   boolean  optional  

Example: false

typo_tolerance   boolean  optional  

Example: true

exact_match   boolean  optional  

Example: true

boost_new_products   boolean  optional  

Example: true

boost_in_stock   boolean  optional  

Example: false

Retrieve a specific product with enhanced data

requires authentication

Get detailed information about a specific product including all variants, media, category details, vendor information, tags, search metadata, and administrative information. This endpoint provides complete product data needed for product management, editing, and detailed analysis.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/products/1" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/products/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/products/1';
$response = $client->get(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/products/1'
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('GET', url, headers=headers)
response.json()

Example response (401):

Show headers 
cache-control: no-cache, private
content-type: application/json
 

{
    "message": "Unauthenticated."
}

Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/admin/products/{id}

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

id   integer   

The ID of the product. Example: 1

product   integer   

The ID of the product to retrieve. Example: 15

Create a new product with enhanced features

requires authentication

Add a new product to the system with complete details including variants, tags, media, and search optimization. Products are automatically assigned to the vendor associated with the authenticated admin user. Supports secure file uploads and automatic search keyword generation for optimal findability.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/products" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: multipart/form-data" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --form "name="Premium Wireless Earbuds Pro""\
    --form "description="High-quality wireless earbuds with advanced noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life.""\
    --form "price=89.99"\
    --form "product_category_id=5"\
    --form "product_status_id=1"\
    --form "quantity=50"\
    --form "product_tags[]=3"\
    --form "product_variants[]=architecto"\
    --form "low_stock_threshold=5"\
    --form "media[featured_image]=@/tmp/phpjLeeDO"     --form "media[gallery][]=@/tmp/phpoUiHL2" 
const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/products"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "multipart/form-data",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

const body = new FormData();
body.append('name', '"Premium Wireless Earbuds Pro"');
body.append('description', '"High-quality wireless earbuds with advanced noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life."');
body.append('price', '89.99');
body.append('product_category_id', '5');
body.append('product_status_id', '1');
body.append('quantity', '50');
body.append('product_tags[]', '3');
body.append('product_variants[]', 'architecto');
body.append('low_stock_threshold', '5');
body.append('media[featured_image]', document.querySelector('input[name="media[featured_image]"]').files[0]);
body.append('media[gallery][]', document.querySelector('input[name="media[gallery][]"]').files[0]);

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/products';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'multipart/form-data',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'multipart' => [
            [
                'name' => 'name',
                'contents' => '"Premium Wireless Earbuds Pro"'
            ],
            [
                'name' => 'description',
                'contents' => '"High-quality wireless earbuds with advanced noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life."'
            ],
            [
                'name' => 'price',
                'contents' => '89.99'
            ],
            [
                'name' => 'product_category_id',
                'contents' => '5'
            ],
            [
                'name' => 'product_status_id',
                'contents' => '1'
            ],
            [
                'name' => 'quantity',
                'contents' => '50'
            ],
            [
                'name' => 'product_tags[]',
                'contents' => '3'
            ],
            [
                'name' => 'product_variants[]',
                'contents' => 'architecto'
            ],
            [
                'name' => 'low_stock_threshold',
                'contents' => '5'
            ],
            [
                'name' => 'media[featured_image]',
                'contents' => fopen('/tmp/phpjLeeDO', 'r')
            ],
            [
                'name' => 'media[gallery][]',
                'contents' => fopen('/tmp/phpoUiHL2', 'r')
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/products'
files = {
  'name': (None, '"Premium Wireless Earbuds Pro"'),
  'description': (None, '"High-quality wireless earbuds with advanced noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life."'),
  'price': (None, '89.99'),
  'product_category_id': (None, '5'),
  'product_status_id': (None, '1'),
  'quantity': (None, '50'),
  'product_tags[]': (None, '3'),
  'product_variants[]': (None, 'architecto'),
  'low_stock_threshold': (None, '5'),
  'media[featured_image]': open('/tmp/phpjLeeDO', 'rb')  'media[gallery][]': open('/tmp/phpoUiHL2', 'rb')}
payload = {
    "name": "\"Premium Wireless Earbuds Pro\"",
    "description": "\"High-quality wireless earbuds with advanced noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life.\"",
    "price": "89.99",
    "product_category_id": 5,
    "product_status_id": 1,
    "quantity": 50,
    "product_tags": [
        3,
        7,
        12,
        18
    ],
    "product_variants": [
        "architecto"
    ],
    "low_stock_threshold": 5
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'multipart/form-data',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, files=files)
response.json()
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/admin/products

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: multipart/form-data

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

name   string   

The product name. Will be used for display and search optimization. Example: "Premium Wireless Earbuds Pro"

description   string  optional  

optional Detailed product description. Supports basic HTML tags and is used for search indexing. Example: "High-quality wireless earbuds with advanced noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life."

price   numeric   

Product price in pounds. Will be converted to pennies for storage. Example: 89.99

product_category_id   integer   

The category ID this product belongs to. Example: 5

product_status_id   integer   

The status ID for this product. Example: 1

quantity   integer   

Available stock quantity. Example: 50

product_tags   string[]  optional  

optional Array of tag IDs to associate with this product for better searchability.

product_variants   string[]  optional  

optional Array of product variants with enhanced attributes.
product_attribute_id   string   

The id of an existing record in the product_attributes table. Example: architecto

value   string  optional  

This field is required when product_variants is present. Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: n

additional_price   number  optional  

Must be at least 0. Example: 84

quantity   integer   

Must be at least 0. Example: 12

*   object  optional  
product_attribute_id   integer   

The attribute ID for this variant. Example: 1

value   string   

The value for this variant. Example: "Midnight Black"

additional_price   numeric  optional  

optional Additional price for this variant in pounds. Example: 10.00

quantity   integer   

Stock quantity for this variant. Example: 25

low_stock_threshold   integer  optional  

optional Low stock threshold for this variant. Default: 5. Example: 3

media   object  optional  
featured_image   file  optional  

optional Featured product image. Max 5MB, dimensions 100x100 to 4000x4000px. Example: /tmp/phpjLeeDO

gallery   file[]  optional  

optional Gallery images. Each max 5MB, dimensions 100x100 to 4000x4000px.

low_stock_threshold   integer  optional  

optional Low stock alert threshold. Default: 10. Example: 5

Update an existing product with enhanced features

requires authentication

Modify an existing product's details including variants, tags, media, and search optimization. This endpoint supports partial updates - only provided fields will be updated. When updating variants, all existing variants are replaced with the new ones. Search keywords are automatically regenerated for optimal findability.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/products/1" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: multipart/form-data" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --form "name="Premium Wireless Earbuds Pro Max""\
    --form "description="Enhanced wireless earbuds with improved noise cancellation and extended battery life.""\
    --form "price=99.99"\
    --form "product_category_id=6"\
    --form "product_status_id=1"\
    --form "quantity=75"\
    --form "product_tags[]=3"\
    --form "product_variants[]=architecto"\
    --form "low_stock_threshold=8"\
    --form "media[featured_image]=@/tmp/phpKclgDO"     --form "media[gallery][]=@/tmp/phpbv1cmv" 
const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/products/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "multipart/form-data",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

const body = new FormData();
body.append('name', '"Premium Wireless Earbuds Pro Max"');
body.append('description', '"Enhanced wireless earbuds with improved noise cancellation and extended battery life."');
body.append('price', '99.99');
body.append('product_category_id', '6');
body.append('product_status_id', '1');
body.append('quantity', '75');
body.append('product_tags[]', '3');
body.append('product_variants[]', 'architecto');
body.append('low_stock_threshold', '8');
body.append('media[featured_image]', document.querySelector('input[name="media[featured_image]"]').files[0]);
body.append('media[gallery][]', document.querySelector('input[name="media[gallery][]"]').files[0]);

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/products/1';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'multipart/form-data',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'multipart' => [
            [
                'name' => 'name',
                'contents' => '"Premium Wireless Earbuds Pro Max"'
            ],
            [
                'name' => 'description',
                'contents' => '"Enhanced wireless earbuds with improved noise cancellation and extended battery life."'
            ],
            [
                'name' => 'price',
                'contents' => '99.99'
            ],
            [
                'name' => 'product_category_id',
                'contents' => '6'
            ],
            [
                'name' => 'product_status_id',
                'contents' => '1'
            ],
            [
                'name' => 'quantity',
                'contents' => '75'
            ],
            [
                'name' => 'product_tags[]',
                'contents' => '3'
            ],
            [
                'name' => 'product_variants[]',
                'contents' => 'architecto'
            ],
            [
                'name' => 'low_stock_threshold',
                'contents' => '8'
            ],
            [
                'name' => 'media[featured_image]',
                'contents' => fopen('/tmp/phpKclgDO', 'r')
            ],
            [
                'name' => 'media[gallery][]',
                'contents' => fopen('/tmp/phpbv1cmv', 'r')
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/products/1'
files = {
  'name': (None, '"Premium Wireless Earbuds Pro Max"'),
  'description': (None, '"Enhanced wireless earbuds with improved noise cancellation and extended battery life."'),
  'price': (None, '99.99'),
  'product_category_id': (None, '6'),
  'product_status_id': (None, '1'),
  'quantity': (None, '75'),
  'product_tags[]': (None, '3'),
  'product_variants[]': (None, 'architecto'),
  'low_stock_threshold': (None, '8'),
  'media[featured_image]': open('/tmp/phpKclgDO', 'rb')  'media[gallery][]': open('/tmp/phpbv1cmv', 'rb')}
payload = {
    "name": "\"Premium Wireless Earbuds Pro Max\"",
    "description": "\"Enhanced wireless earbuds with improved noise cancellation and extended battery life.\"",
    "price": "99.99",
    "product_category_id": 6,
    "product_status_id": 1,
    "quantity": 75,
    "product_tags": [
        3,
        7,
        12,
        18,
        22
    ],
    "product_variants": [
        "architecto"
    ],
    "low_stock_threshold": 8
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'multipart/form-data',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, files=files)
response.json()
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/admin/products/{id}

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: multipart/form-data

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

id   integer   

The ID of the product. Example: 1

product   integer   

The ID of the product to update. Example: 47

Body Parameters

name   string  optional  

optional The updated product name. Example: "Premium Wireless Earbuds Pro Max"

description   string  optional  

optional Updated product description with search optimization. Example: "Enhanced wireless earbuds with improved noise cancellation and extended battery life."

price   numeric  optional  

optional Updated price in pounds. Example: 99.99

product_category_id   integer  optional  

optional Updated category ID. Example: 6

product_status_id   integer  optional  

optional Updated status ID. Example: 1

quantity   integer  optional  

optional Updated stock quantity. Example: 75

product_tags   string[]  optional  

optional Updated array of tag IDs for better search optimization.

product_variants   string[]  optional  

optional Updated array of variants (replaces existing).
product_attribute_id   string   

The id of an existing record in the product_attributes table. Example: architecto

value   string  optional  

This field is required when product_variants is present. Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: n

additional_price   number  optional  

Must be at least 0. Example: 84

quantity   integer   

Must be at least 0. Example: 12

*   object  optional  
product_attribute_id   integer   

Attribute ID for variant. Example: 1

value   string   

Variant value. Example: "Pearl White"

additional_price   numeric  optional  

optional Additional price in pounds. Example: 15.00

quantity   integer   

Variant stock quantity. Example: 20

low_stock_threshold   integer  optional  

optional Variant low stock threshold. Example: 2

media   object  optional  
featured_image   file  optional  

optional New featured image (replaces existing). Example: /tmp/phpKclgDO

gallery   file[]  optional  

optional New gallery images (replaces existing).

low_stock_threshold   integer  optional  

optional Updated low stock threshold. Example: 8

Soft delete a product with search index update

requires authentication

Soft delete a product, making it inactive but preserving the data for potential recovery. Soft deleted products are hidden from public listings but remain in the database for administrative purposes and order history integrity. Search indexes are updated automatically.

Example request:
curl --request DELETE \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/products/soft-destroy/1" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/products/soft-destroy/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "DELETE",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/products/soft-destroy/1';
$response = $client->delete(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response.json()

You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

DELETE api/admin/products/soft-destroy/{product_id}

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

product_id   integer   

The ID of the product. Example: 1

product   integer   

The ID of the product to soft delete. Example: 47

Permanently delete a product with complete cleanup

requires authentication

Permanently remove a product from the database. This action is irreversible and will also remove all associated variants, media files, tag associations, and search indexes. The product must be soft deleted first before it can be permanently deleted.

Example request:
curl --request DELETE \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/products/47" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/products/47"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "DELETE",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/products/47';
$response = $client->delete(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

id   integer   

The ID of the soft deleted product to permanently delete. Example: 47

Restore a soft deleted product with search optimization

requires authentication

Restore a previously soft deleted product, making it active again in the system. Only products that have been soft deleted can be restored. Search indexes are automatically updated to include the restored product.

Example request:
curl --request PATCH \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/products/47/restore" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/products/47/restore"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "PATCH",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/products/47/restore';
$response = $client->patch(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

import json
