            "user": {
                "id": 45,
                "name": "John Smith",
                "email": "john@example.com"
            }
        },
        "shipping_method": {
            "id": 2,
            "name": "Standard Delivery",
            "carrier": "Royal Mail",
            "estimated_delivery": "3-5 days"
        },
        "tracking_events": [
            {
                "timestamp": "2025-01-15T10:00:00.000000Z",
                "status": "shipped",
                "description": "Item dispatched",
                "location": "London Mail Centre"
            }
        ],
        "shipping_address": {
            "id": 67,
            "name": "John Smith",
            "full_address": "123 Main St, London, SW1A 1AA",
            "country": "GB",
            "postcode": "SW1A 1AA"
        },
        "estimated_delivery_window": {
            "date": "2025-01-17T17:00:00.000000Z",
            "is_overdue": false,
            "days_remaining": 2
        },
        "created_at": "2025-01-15T09:45:00.000000Z",
        "updated_at": "2025-01-15T10:00:00.000000Z"
    }
}

Example response (403, Insufficient permissions):


{
    "message": "You do not have the required permissions."
}

Example response (404, Shipment not found):


{
    "message": "No query results for model [App\\Models\\Shipment] 999"
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/admin/shipments/{id}

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

id   integer   

The ID of the shipment. Example: 16

shipment   integer   

The ID of the shipment to retrieve. Example: 48

Update an existing shipment

requires authentication

Update shipment details including status, tracking information, and carrier data. The system validates status transitions and automatically updates order fulfillment status when shipment is marked as shipped. Cannot update delivered or cancelled shipments.

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipments/16" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"tracking_number\": \"AB123456789GB\",
    \"carrier\": \"Royal Mail\",
    \"service_name\": \"Tracked 48\",
    \"status\": \"shipped\",
    \"shipping_cost\": \"5.99\",
    \"label_url\": \"https:\\/\\/example.com\\/labels\\/123.pdf\",
    \"tracking_url\": \"https:\\/\\/track.royalmail.com\\/AB123456789GB\",
    \"shipped_at\": \"2025-01-15 10:00:00\",
    \"delivered_at\": \"2025-01-17 14:30:00\",
    \"estimated_delivery\": \"2025-01-17 17:00:00\",
    \"notes\": \"Left at front door\",
    \"carrier_data\": {
        \"signature\": \"J.Smith\"
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipments/16"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "tracking_number": "AB123456789GB",
    "carrier": "Royal Mail",
    "service_name": "Tracked 48",
    "status": "shipped",
    "shipping_cost": "5.99",
    "label_url": "https:\/\/example.com\/labels\/123.pdf",
    "tracking_url": "https:\/\/track.royalmail.com\/AB123456789GB",
    "shipped_at": "2025-01-15 10:00:00",
    "delivered_at": "2025-01-17 14:30:00",
    "estimated_delivery": "2025-01-17 17:00:00",
    "notes": "Left at front door",
    "carrier_data": {
        "signature": "J.Smith"
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "PUT",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipments/16';
$response = $client->put(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'tracking_number' => 'AB123456789GB',
            'carrier' => 'Royal Mail',
            'service_name' => 'Tracked 48',
            'status' => 'shipped',
            'shipping_cost' => '5.99',
            'label_url' => 'https://example.com/labels/123.pdf',
            'tracking_url' => 'https://track.royalmail.com/AB123456789GB',
            'shipped_at' => '2025-01-15 10:00:00',
            'delivered_at' => '2025-01-17 14:30:00',
            'estimated_delivery' => '2025-01-17 17:00:00',
            'notes' => 'Left at front door',
            'carrier_data' => [
                'signature' => 'J.Smith',
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipments/16'
payload = {
    "tracking_number": "AB123456789GB",
    "carrier": "Royal Mail",
    "service_name": "Tracked 48",
    "status": "shipped",
    "shipping_cost": "5.99",
    "label_url": "https:\/\/example.com\/labels\/123.pdf",
    "tracking_url": "https:\/\/track.royalmail.com\/AB123456789GB",
    "shipped_at": "2025-01-15 10:00:00",
    "delivered_at": "2025-01-17 14:30:00",
    "estimated_delivery": "2025-01-17 17:00:00",
    "notes": "Left at front door",
    "carrier_data": {
        "signature": "J.Smith"
    }
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('PUT', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()

Example response (200, Shipment updated successfully):


{
    "message": "Shipment updated successfully.",
    "data": {
        "id": 48,
        "order_id": 123,
        "tracking_number": "AB123456789GB",
        "carrier": "Royal Mail",
        "service_name": "Tracked 48",
        "status": "shipped",
        "status_label": "Shipped",
        "shipping_cost": 599,
        "shipping_cost_formatted": "£5.99",
        "label_url": "https://example.com/labels/123.pdf",
        "tracking_url": "https://track.royalmail.com/AB123456789GB",
        "shipped_at": "2025-01-15T10:00:00.000000Z",
        "estimated_delivery": "2025-01-17T17:00:00.000000Z",
        "notes": "Left at front door",
        "order": {
            "id": 123,
            "fulfillment_status": "shipped"
        },
        "updated_at": "2025-01-15T15:30:00.000000Z"
    }
}

Example response (400, Invalid status transition):


{
    "message": "Invalid status transition from pending to delivered."
}

Example response (403, Insufficient permissions):


{
    "message": "You do not have the required permissions."
}

Example response (422, Validation errors):


{
    "errors": [
        "The tracking number must be at least 8 characters.",
        "The delivered at must be after or equal to ship date."
    ]
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

PUT api/admin/shipments/{id}

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

id   integer   

The ID of the shipment. Example: 16

shipment   integer   

The ID of the shipment to update. Example: 48

Body Parameters

tracking_number   string  optional  

optional The tracking number from carrier. Example: AB123456789GB

carrier   string  optional  

optional The carrier name. Example: Royal Mail

service_name   string  optional  

optional The specific service name. Example: Tracked 48

status   string  optional  

optional The shipment status. Example: shipped

shipping_cost   numeric  optional  

optional The shipping cost in pounds. Example: 5.99

label_url   string  optional  

optional URL to the shipping label PDF. Example: https://example.com/labels/123.pdf

tracking_url   string  optional  

optional URL to carrier tracking page. Example: https://track.royalmail.com/AB123456789GB

shipped_at   string  optional  

optional Date/time when shipment was shipped. Example: 2025-01-15 10:00:00

delivered_at   string  optional  

optional Date/time when shipment was delivered. Example: 2025-01-17 14:30:00

estimated_delivery   string  optional  

optional Estimated delivery date/time. Example: 2025-01-17 17:00:00

notes   string  optional  

optional Additional notes about the shipment. Example: Left at front door

carrier_data   object  optional  

optional Additional carrier-specific data.

Cancel a shipment

requires authentication

Cancel an active shipment with an optional reason. This marks the shipment as cancelled and can trigger refund processes for shipping costs if applicable. Cannot cancel shipments that have already been delivered or are in transit.

Example request:
curl --request DELETE \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipments/16" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"reason\": \"Customer requested cancellation\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipments/16"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "reason": "Customer requested cancellation"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "DELETE",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipments/16';
$response = $client->delete(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'reason' => 'Customer requested cancellation',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipments/16'
payload = {
    "reason": "Customer requested cancellation"
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('DELETE', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()

Example response (200, Shipment cancelled successfully):


{
    "message": "Shipment cancelled successfully."
}

Example response (400, Cannot cancel shipment):


{
    "message": "Cannot cancel shipment that has already been shipped."
}

Example response (403, Insufficient permissions):


{
    "message": "You do not have the required permissions."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

DELETE api/admin/shipments/{id}

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

id   integer   

The ID of the shipment. Example: 16

shipment   integer   

The ID of the shipment to cancel. Example: 48

Body Parameters

reason   string  optional  

optional Reason for cancellation. Example: Customer requested cancellation

Purchase shipping label

requires authentication

Purchase a shipping label for the specified shipment using the configured carrier API. This generates a printable label PDF and may provide tracking information. The label cost is typically included in the shipping cost calculation.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipments/16/purchase-label" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipments/16/purchase-label"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipments/16/purchase-label';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipments/16/purchase-label'
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers)
response.json()

Example response (200, Label purchased successfully):


{
    "message": "Shipping label purchased successfully.",
    "data": {
        "shipment": {
            "id": 48,
            "tracking_number": "AB123456789GB",
            "label_url": "https://example.com/labels/123.pdf",
            "status": "ready_to_ship"
        },
        "label_data": {
            "label_url": "https://example.com/labels/123.pdf",
            "tracking_number": "AB123456789GB",
            "label_format": "PDF",
            "cost": 599,
            "cost_formatted": "£5.99"
        }
    }
}

Example response (400, Label already purchased):


{
    "message": "Shipping label already exists for this shipment."
}

Example response (403, Insufficient permissions):


{
    "message": "You do not have the required permissions."
}

Example response (500, Carrier API error):


{
    "message": "Failed to purchase label: Carrier API unavailable."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/admin/shipments/{shipment_id}/purchase-label

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

shipment_id   integer   

The ID of the shipment. Example: 16

shipment   integer   

The ID of the shipment to purchase label for. Example: 48

Update tracking information

requires authentication

Manually trigger an update of tracking information from the carrier API. This fetches the latest tracking events and updates the shipment status accordingly. Useful for getting real-time delivery updates.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipments/16/tracking-update" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipments/16/tracking-update"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipments/16/tracking-update';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipments/16/tracking-update'
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers)
response.json()

Example response (200, Tracking updated successfully):


{
    "message": "Tracking information updated successfully.",
    "data": {
        "shipment": {
            "id": 48,
            "tracking_number": "AB123456789GB",
            "status": "in_transit",
            "delivered_at": null,
            "tracking_events": [
                {
                    "timestamp": "2025-01-15T10:00:00.000000Z",
                    "status": "shipped",
                    "description": "Item dispatched",
                    "location": "London Mail Centre"
                },
                {
                    "timestamp": "2025-01-16T08:30:00.000000Z",
                    "status": "in_transit",
                    "description": "Item in transit",
                    "location": "Birmingham Mail Centre"
                }
            ]
        },
        "tracking_data": {
            "status": "in_transit",
            "last_updated": "2025-01-16T08:30:00.000000Z",
            "events_count": 2,
            "estimated_delivery": "2025-01-17T17:00:00.000000Z"
        }
    }
}

Example response (400, No tracking number):


{
    "message": "Shipment has no tracking number."
}

Example response (403, Insufficient permissions):


{
    "message": "You do not have the required permissions."
}

Example response (500, Tracking API error):


{
    "message": "Failed to update tracking: Carrier API unavailable."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/admin/shipments/{shipment_id}/tracking-update

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

shipment_id   integer   

The ID of the shipment. Example: 16

shipment   integer   

The ID of the shipment to update tracking for. Example: 48

Mark shipment as shipped

requires authentication

Mark a shipment as shipped with tracking number and optional label URL. This updates the shipment status, sets the shipped timestamp, and can trigger customer notifications. This is typically used when labels are purchased through external systems.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipments/16/mark-shipped" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"tracking_number\": \"AB123456789GB\",
    \"label_url\": \"https:\\/\\/example.com\\/labels\\/123.pdf\",
    \"send_notification\": true
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipments/16/mark-shipped"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "tracking_number": "AB123456789GB",
    "label_url": "https:\/\/example.com\/labels\/123.pdf",
    "send_notification": true
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipments/16/mark-shipped';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'tracking_number' => 'AB123456789GB',
            'label_url' => 'https://example.com/labels/123.pdf',
            'send_notification' => true,
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipments/16/mark-shipped'
payload = {
    "tracking_number": "AB123456789GB",
    "label_url": "https:\/\/example.com\/labels\/123.pdf",
    "send_notification": true
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()

Example response (200, Shipment marked as shipped):


{
    "message": "Shipment marked as shipped successfully.",
    "data": {
        "id": 48,
        "tracking_number": "AB123456789GB",
        "status": "shipped",
        "status_label": "Shipped",
        "shipped_at": "2025-01-15T14:30:00.000000Z",
        "label_url": "https://example.com/labels/123.pdf",
        "tracking_url": "https://track.royalmail.com/AB123456789GB",
        "order": {
            "id": 123,
            "fulfillment_status": "shipped"
        }
    }
}

Example response (400, Already shipped):


{
    "message": "Shipment has already been shipped."
}

Example response (403, Insufficient permissions):


{
    "message": "You do not have the required permissions."
}

Example response (422, Validation errors):


{
    "errors": [
        "The tracking number field is required.",
        "The tracking number must be at least 8 characters."
    ]
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/admin/shipments/{shipment_id}/mark-shipped

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

shipment_id   integer   

The ID of the shipment. Example: 16

shipment   integer   

The ID of the shipment to mark as shipped. Example: 48

Body Parameters

tracking_number   string   

The tracking number from the carrier. Example: AB123456789GB

label_url   string  optional  

optional URL to the shipping label PDF. Example: https://example.com/labels/123.pdf

send_notification   boolean  optional  

optional Whether to send notification to customer. Default: true. Example: true

Bulk update multiple shipments

requires authentication

Perform bulk operations on multiple shipments such as updating status, purchasing labels, or updating tracking information. This is useful for processing multiple shipments efficiently. Returns detailed results and errors for each shipment.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipments/bulk-update" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"shipment_ids\": [
        1,
        2,
        3
    ],
    \"action\": \"update_status\",
    \"status\": \"shipped\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipments/bulk-update"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "shipment_ids": [
        1,
        2,
        3
    ],
    "action": "update_status",
    "status": "shipped"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipments/bulk-update';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'shipment_ids' => [
                1,
                2,
                3,
            ],
            'action' => 'update_status',
            'status' => 'shipped',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipments/bulk-update'
payload = {
    "shipment_ids": [
        1,
        2,
        3
    ],
    "action": "update_status",
    "status": "shipped"
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()

Example response (200, Bulk operation completed):


{
    "message": "Bulk operation completed.",
    "data": {
        "success_count": 2,
        "error_count": 1,
        "results": [
            "Shipment 1 status updated",
            "Shipment 2 status updated"
        ],
        "errors": [
            "Shipment 3: Cannot update delivered shipment"
        ]
    }
}

Example response (403, Insufficient permissions):


{
    "message": "You do not have the required permissions."
}

Example response (422, Validation errors):


{
    "errors": [
        "The shipment ids field is required.",
        "The action field is required.",
        "The status field is required when action is update_status."
    ]
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/admin/shipments/bulk-update

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

shipment_ids   string[]   

Array of shipment IDs to update.
*   integer   

Each shipment ID must be a valid integer. Example: 1

action   string   

The action to perform (update_status, purchase_labels, update_tracking). Example: update_status

status   string  optional  

optional Required if action is update_status. The new status to set. Example: shipped

Create shipment from order

requires authentication

Create a new shipment directly from an order with simplified parameters. This is a convenience method that uses order details to pre-populate shipment information. Useful for quick shipment creation from order management interfaces.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipments/orders/1/create-shipment" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"auto_purchase_label\": true,
    \"send_notification\": true,
    \"notes\": \"Express delivery requested\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipments/orders/1/create-shipment"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "auto_purchase_label": true,
    "send_notification": true,
    "notes": "Express delivery requested"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipments/orders/1/create-shipment';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'auto_purchase_label' => true,
            'send_notification' => true,
            'notes' => 'Express delivery requested',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipments/orders/1/create-shipment'
payload = {
    "auto_purchase_label": true,
    "send_notification": true,
    "notes": "Express delivery requested"
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()

Example response (200, Shipment created from order):


{
    "message": "Shipment created from order successfully.",
    "data": {
        "id": 49,
        "order_id": 123,
        "shipping_method_id": 2,
        "carrier": "Royal Mail",
        "status": "pending",
        "shipping_cost": 599,
        "shipping_cost_formatted": "£5.99",
        "notes": "Express delivery requested",
        "order": {
            "id": 123,
            "total_amount": 2999,
            "total_amount_formatted": "£29.99",
            "shipping_method": {
                "id": 2,
                "name": "Standard Delivery",
                "carrier": "Royal Mail"
            }
        },
        "shipping_method": {
            "id": 2,
            "name": "Standard Delivery",
            "carrier": "Royal Mail"
        },
        "created_at": "2025-01-15T16:20:00.000000Z",
        "updated_at": "2025-01-15T16:20:00.000000Z"
    }
}

Example response (400, Order cannot be shipped):


{
    "message": "Order does not have a shipping method selected."
}

Example response (403, Insufficient permissions):


{
    "message": "You do not have the required permissions."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/admin/shipments/orders/{order_id}/create-shipment

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

order_id   integer   

The ID of the order. Example: 1

order   integer   

The ID of the order to create shipment for. Example: 123

Body Parameters

auto_purchase_label   boolean  optional  

optional Whether to automatically purchase shipping label. Default: false. Example: true

send_notification   boolean  optional  

optional Whether to send notification to customer. Default: true. Example: true

notes   string  optional  

optional Additional notes for the shipment. Example: Express delivery requested

Shipping Calculations

Get shipping quotes for cart contents

requires authentication

Calculate shipping costs for the current user's cart contents to a specific address. This endpoint analyzes cart weight, dimensions, and value to provide accurate shipping quotes from all applicable shipping methods. Essential for checkout process.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/shipping/cart/quote" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"shipping_address_id\": 1
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/shipping/cart/quote"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "shipping_address_id": 1
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/shipping/cart/quote';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'shipping_address_id' => 1,
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/shipping/cart/quote'
payload = {
    "shipping_address_id": 1
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()

Example response (200, Shipping quotes retrieved successfully):


{
    "message": "Shipping quotes retrieved successfully.",
    "data": {
        "shipping_methods": [
            {
                "id": 1,
                "name": "Standard Delivery",
                "carrier": "Royal Mail",
                "service_code": "tracked-48",
                "description": "Tracked delivery within 2-3 working days",
                "estimated_delivery": "2-3 days",
                "cost": 599,
                "cost_formatted": "£5.99",
                "is_free": false,
                "free_threshold": 10000,
                "free_threshold_formatted": "£100.00",
                "supports_tracking": true,
                "requires_signature": false,
                "estimated_delivery_date": "2025-01-17T17:00:00.000000Z",
                "transit_time": "2-3 days"
            },
            {
                "id": 2,
                "name": "Express Delivery",
                "carrier": "DPD",
                "service_code": "next-day",
                "description": "Next working day delivery by 1pm",
                "estimated_delivery": "1 day",
                "cost": 999,
                "cost_formatted": "£9.99",
                "is_free": false,
                "free_threshold": 15000,
                "free_threshold_formatted": "£150.00",
                "supports_tracking": true,
                "requires_signature": true,
                "estimated_delivery_date": "2025-01-16T13:00:00.000000Z",
                "transit_time": "1 day"
            }
        ],
        "cart_summary": {
            "total_weight": 2.5,
            "total_amount": 4599,
            "total_amount_formatted": "£45.99",
            "items_count": 3,
            "requires_shipping": true
        },
        "shipping_address": {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "John Smith",
            "full_address": "123 Main Street, Suite 100, London, SW1A 1AA, United Kingdom",
            "country": "GB",
            "postcode": "SW1A 1AA"
        },
        "shipping_restrictions": {
            "restricted_countries": [],
            "restricted_postcodes": [],
            "hazardous_items": false,
            "oversized_items": false,
            "restricted_items": []
        }
    }
}

Example response (200, No shipping options available):


{
    "message": "No shipping options available for this address.",
    "data": {
        "shipping_methods": [],
        "cart_requires_shipping": true,
        "shipping_restrictions": {
            "restricted_countries": [
                "US",
                "CA"
            ],
            "restricted_postcodes": [
                "BT1",
                "BT2"
            ],
            "hazardous_items": true,
            "oversized_items": false,
            "restricted_items": [
                "lithium_batteries"
            ]
        }
    }
}

Example response (400, Cart is empty):


{
    "message": "Cart is empty."
}

Example response (404, Shipping address not found):


{
    "message": "Shipping address not found."
}

Example response (422, Validation errors):


{
    "errors": [
        "The shipping address id field is required.",
        "The shipping address id must be an integer.",
        "The shipping address id must exist in shipping_addresses table."
    ]
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/shipping/cart/quote

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

shipping_address_id   integer   

The ID of the shipping address to calculate rates for. Example: 1

Get shipping quotes for specific products

requires authentication

Calculate shipping costs for specific products and quantities to a shipping address. This is useful for getting shipping estimates before adding items to cart or for product pages showing shipping costs.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/shipping/products/quote" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"product_ids\": [
        1,
        2,
        3
    ],
    \"quantities\": [
        2,
        1,
        3
    ],
    \"shipping_address_id\": 1
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/shipping/products/quote"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "product_ids": [
        1,
        2,
        3
    ],
    "quantities": [
        2,
        1,
        3
    ],
    "shipping_address_id": 1
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/shipping/products/quote';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'product_ids' => [
                1,
                2,
                3,
            ],
            'quantities' => [
                2,
                1,
                3,
            ],
            'shipping_address_id' => 1,
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/shipping/products/quote'
payload = {
    "product_ids": [
        1,
        2,
        3
    ],
    "quantities": [
        2,
        1,
        3
    ],
    "shipping_address_id": 1
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()

Example response (200, Product shipping quotes retrieved successfully):


{
    "message": "Product shipping quotes retrieved successfully.",
    "data": {
        "shipping_methods": [
            {
                "id": 1,
                "name": "Standard Delivery",
                "carrier": "Royal Mail",
                "service_code": "tracked-48",
                "description": "Tracked delivery within 2-3 working days",
                "estimated_delivery": "2-3 days",
                "cost": 799,
                "cost_formatted": "£7.99",
                "is_free": false,
                "free_threshold": 10000,
                "free_threshold_formatted": "£100.00",
                "supports_tracking": true,
                "requires_signature": false,
                "estimated_delivery_date": "2025-01-17T17:00:00.000000Z",
                "transit_time": "2-3 days"
            }
        ],
        "products_summary": {
            "total_weight": 3.8,
            "total_weight_formatted": "3.8kg",
            "total_value": 7999,
            "total_value_formatted": "£79.99",
            "products_count": 3,
            "requires_shipping": true
        },
        "shipping_address": {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "John Smith",
            "full_address": "123 Main Street, Suite 100, London, SW1A 1AA, United Kingdom",
            "country": "GB",
            "postcode": "SW1A 1AA"
        }
    }
}

Example response (200, No shipping options available):


{
    "message": "No shipping options available for these products.",
    "data": {
        "shipping_methods": [],
        "products_require_shipping": true
    }
}

Example response (404, Products not found):


{
    "message": "One or more products not found."
}

Example response (404, Shipping address not found):


{
    "message": "Shipping address not found."
}

Example response (422, Validation errors):


{
    "errors": [
        "The product ids field is required.",
        "The product ids must be an array.",
        "The quantities field is required.",
        "The quantities must be an array.",
        "The shipping address id field is required."
    ]
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:

If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/shipping/products/quote

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

product_ids   string[]   

Array of product IDs to calculate shipping for.
*   integer   

Each product ID must be a valid product ID. Example: 1

quantities   string[]   

Array of quantities for each product (must match product_ids).
*   integer   

Each quantity must be a positive integer. Example: 2

shipping_address_id   integer   

The ID of the shipping address to calculate rates for. Example: 1

Get quick shipping estimate

requires authentication

Get a quick shipping estimate for a specific location, weight, and value without requiring authentication or specific products. This is useful for product pages or marketing materials to show approximate shipping costs.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/shipping/estimate" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"country\": \"GB\",
    \"postcode\": \"SW1A 1AA\",
    \"weight\": \"2.5\",
    \"value\": \"49.99\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/shipping/estimate"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "country": "GB",
    "postcode": "SW1A 1AA",
    "weight": "2.5",
    "value": "49.99"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/shipping/estimate';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'country' => 'GB',
            'postcode' => 'SW1A 1AA',
            'weight' => '2.5',
            'value' => '49.99',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/shipping/estimate'
payload = {
    "country": "GB",
    "postcode": "SW1A 1AA",
    "weight": "2.5",
    "value": "49.99"
}

  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()

Example response (200, Quick shipping estimate retrieved successfully):


{
    "message": "Quick shipping estimate retrieved successfully.",
    "data": {
        "shipping_methods": [
            {
                "id": 1,
                "name": "Standard Delivery",
                "carrier": "Royal Mail",
                "service_code": "tracked-48",
                "description": "Tracked delivery within 2-3 working days",
                "estimated_delivery": "2-3 days",
                "cost": 599,
                "cost_formatted": "£5.99",
                "is_free": false,
                "free_threshold": 10000,
                "free_threshold_formatted": "£100.00",
                "supports_tracking": true,
                "requires_signature": false,
                "estimated_delivery_date": "2025-01-17T17:00:00.000000Z",
                "transit_time": "2-3 days"
            },
            {
                "id": 2,
                "name": "Express Delivery",
                "carrier": "DPD",
                "service_code": "next-day",
                "description": "Next working day delivery by 1pm",
                "estimated_delivery": "1 day",
                "cost": 999,
                "cost_formatted": "£9.99",
                "is_free": false,
                "free_threshold": 15000,
                "free_threshold_formatted": "£150.00",
                "supports_tracking": true,
                "requires_signature": true,
                "estimated_delivery_date": "2025-01-16T13:00:00.000000Z",
                "transit_time": "1 day"
            }
        ],
        "shipment_details": {
            "weight": 2.5,
            "weight_unit": "kg",
            "value": 4999,
            "value_formatted": "£49.99"
        },
        "location": {
            "country": "GB",
            "postcode": "SW1A 1AA"
        }
    }
}

Example response (200, No shipping options available):


{
    "message": "No shipping options available for this location.",
    "data": {
        "shipping_methods": [],
        "location": {
            "country": "GB",
            "postcode": "SW1A 1AA"
        }
    }
}

Example response (422, Validation errors):


{
    "errors": [
        "The country field is required.",
        "The country must be 2 characters.",
        "The postcode field is required.",
        "The weight field is required.",
        "The weight must be a number.",
        "The value field is required."
    ]
}

Request      

POST api/shipping/estimate

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

country   string   

Two-letter country code (ISO 3166-1 alpha-2). Example: GB

postcode   string   

Postal code for the destination. Example: SW1A 1AA

weight   numeric   

Package weight in kilograms. Example: 2.5

value   numeric   

Package value in pounds. Example: 49.99

Get cheapest shipping option

requires authentication

Find the cheapest shipping option for a specific address and shipment details. This is useful for budget-conscious customers or for displaying the minimum shipping cost on product pages.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/shipping/cheapest" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"shipping_address_id\": 1,
    \"weight\": \"1.5\",
    \"value\": \"75.99\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/shipping/cheapest"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "shipping_address_id": 1,
    "weight": "1.5",
    "value": "75.99"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/shipping/cheapest';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'shipping_address_id' => 1,
            'weight' => '1.5',
            'value' => '75.99',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

    "shipping_address_id": 1,
    "weight": "1.5",
    "value": "75.99"
}

  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response.json()

{
    "message": "Cheapest shipping option retrieved successfully.",
    "data": {
        "cheapest_method": {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "Standard Delivery",
            "carrier": "Royal Mail",
            "service_code": "tracked-48",
            "description": "Tracked delivery within 2-3 working days",
            "estimated_delivery": "2-3 days",
            "cost": 599,
            "cost_formatted": "£5.99",
            "is_free": false,
            "free_threshold": 10000,
            "free_threshold_formatted": "£100.00",
            "supports_tracking": true,
            "requires_signature": false,
            "estimated_delivery_date": "2025-01-17T17:00:00.000000Z",
            "transit_time": "2-3 days"
        },
        "address": {
            "id": 1,
            "country": "GB",
            "postcode": "SW1A 1AA"
        }
    }
}

Example response (200, No shipping options available):


{
    "message": "No shipping options available.",
    "data": {
        "cheapest_method": null
    }
}

Example response (404, Shipping address not found):


{
    "message": "Shipping address not found."
}

Example response (422, Validation errors):


{
    "errors": [
        "The shipping address id field is required.",
        "The shipping address id must be an integer.",
        "The weight must be a number.",
        "The value must be a number."
    ]

Request      

POST api/shipping/cheapest

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

shipping_address_id   integer   

The ID of the shipping address to calculate rates for. Example: 1

weight   numeric  optional  

optional Package weight in kilograms. Default: 1.0. Example: 1.5

value   numeric  optional  

optional Package value in pounds. Default: 50.0. Example: 75.99

Get fastest shipping option

requires authentication

Find the fastest shipping option for a specific address and shipment details. This is useful for urgent deliveries or when customers prioritize speed over cost.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/shipping/fastest" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"shipping_address_id\": 1,
    \"weight\": \"1.5\",
    \"value\": \"75.99\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/shipping/fastest"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "shipping_address_id": 1,
    "weight": "1.5",
    "value": "75.99"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/shipping/fastest';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'shipping_address_id' => 1,
            'weight' => '1.5',
            'value' => '75.99',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/shipping/fastest'
payload = {
    "shipping_address_id": 1,
    "weight": "1.5",
    "value": "75.99"
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()

Example response (200, Fastest shipping option retrieved successfully):


{
    "message": "Fastest shipping option retrieved successfully.",
    "data": {
        "fastest_method": {
            "id": 2,
            "name": "Express Delivery",
            "carrier": "DPD",
            "service_code": "next-day",
            "description": "Next working day delivery by 1pm",
            "estimated_delivery": "1 day",
            "cost": 999,
            "cost_formatted": "£9.99",
            "is_free": false,
            "free_threshold": 15000,
            "free_threshold_formatted": "£150.00",
            "supports_tracking": true,
            "requires_signature": true,
            "estimated_delivery_date": "2025-01-16T13:00:00.000000Z",
            "transit_time": "1 day"
        },
        "address": {
            "id": 1,
            "country": "GB",
            "postcode": "SW1A 1AA"
        }
    }
}

Example response (200, No shipping options available):


{
    "message": "No shipping options available.",
    "data": {
        "fastest_method": null
    }
}

Example response (404, Shipping address not found):


{
    "message": "Shipping address not found."
}

Example response (422, Validation errors):


{
    "errors": [
        "The shipping address id field is required.",
        "The shipping address id must be an integer.",
        "The weight must be a number.",
        "The value must be a number."
    ]
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/shipping/fastest

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

shipping_address_id   integer   

The ID of the shipping address to calculate rates for. Example: 1

weight   numeric  optional  

optional Package weight in kilograms. Default: 1.0. Example: 1.5

value   numeric  optional  

optional Package value in pounds. Default: 50.0. Example: 75.99

Validate shipping method for order

requires authentication

Validate that a specific shipping method is available and calculate the exact cost for a given address, weight, and order total. This is used during checkout to ensure the selected shipping method is still valid and get the final cost.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/shipping/validate-method" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"shipping_method_id\": 1,
    \"shipping_address_id\": 1,
    \"weight\": \"2.5\",
    \"total\": \"89.99\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/shipping/validate-method"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "shipping_method_id": 1,
    "shipping_address_id": 1,
    "weight": "2.5",
    "total": "89.99"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/shipping/validate-method';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'shipping_method_id' => 1,
            'shipping_address_id' => 1,
            'weight' => '2.5',
            'total' => '89.99',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/shipping/validate-method'
payload = {
    "shipping_method_id": 1,
    "shipping_address_id": 1,
    "weight": "2.5",
    "total": "89.99"
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()

Example response (200, Shipping method validation completed):


{
    "message": "Shipping method validation completed.",
    "data": {
        "is_valid": true,
        "shipping_cost": 599,
        "shipping_cost_formatted": "£5.99",
        "method_id": 1,
        "address_id": 1
    }
}

Example response (200, Shipping method not valid):


{
    "message": "Shipping method validation completed.",
    "data": {
        "is_valid": false,
        "shipping_cost": 0,
        "shipping_cost_formatted": "£0.00",
        "method_id": 1,
        "address_id": 1
    }
}

Example response (404, Shipping address not found):


{
    "message": "Shipping address not found."
}

Example response (422, Validation errors):


{
    "errors": [
        "The shipping method id field is required.",
        "The shipping method id must exist in shipping_methods table.",
        "The shipping address id field is required.",
        "The shipping address id must exist in shipping_addresses table."
    ]
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/shipping/validate-method

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

shipping_method_id   integer   

The ID of the shipping method to validate. Example: 1

shipping_address_id   integer   

The ID of the shipping address. Example: 1

weight   numeric  optional  

optional Package weight in kilograms. Default: 0. Example: 2.5

total   numeric  optional  

optional Order total in pounds. Default: 0. Example: 89.99

Shipping Method Management

Retrieve paginated list of shipping methods

requires authentication

Get a paginated list of all shipping methods in the system with optional filtering by carrier and active status. Essential for managing shipping configuration and displaying available shipping options to customers during checkout.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-methods?carrier=royal-mail&is_active=1&page=1&per_page=25" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-methods"
);

const params = {
    "carrier": "royal-mail",
    "is_active": "1",
    "page": "1",
    "per_page": "25",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-methods';
$response = $client->get(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'query' => [
            'carrier' => 'royal-mail',
            'is_active' => '1',
            'page' => '1',
            'per_page' => '25',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-methods'
params = {
  'carrier': 'royal-mail',
  'is_active': '1',
  'page': '1',
  'per_page': '25',
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('GET', url, headers=headers, params=params)
response.json()

Example response (200, Success with shipping methods):


{
    "data": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "Standard Delivery",
            "carrier": "Royal Mail",
            "service_code": "tracked-48",
            "description": "Tracked delivery within 2-3 working days",
            "estimated_delivery": "2-3 days",
            "min_delivery_days": 2,
            "max_delivery_days": 3,
            "is_active": true,
            "is_default": false,
            "supports_tracking": true,
            "requires_signature": false,
            "max_weight": 20000,
            "max_dimensions": {
                "length": 60,
                "width": 46,
                "height": 46
            },
            "sort_order": 1,
            "zones_count": 3,
            "rates_count": 12,
            "created_at": "2025-01-10T09:00:00.000000Z",
            "updated_at": "2025-01-14T14:30:00.000000Z"
        },
        {
            "id": 2,
            "name": "Express Delivery",
            "carrier": "DPD",
            "service_code": "next-day",
            "description": "Next working day delivery by 1pm",
            "estimated_delivery": "1 day",
            "min_delivery_days": 1,
            "max_delivery_days": 1,
            "is_active": true,
            "is_default": false,
            "supports_tracking": true,
            "requires_signature": true,
            "max_weight": 30000,
            "max_dimensions": {
                "length": 120,
                "width": 80,
                "height": 80
            },
            "sort_order": 2,
            "zones_count": 2,
            "rates_count": 8,
            "created_at": "2025-01-10T09:15:00.000000Z",
            "updated_at": "2025-01-14T14:30:00.000000Z"
        }
    ],
    "current_page": 1,
    "per_page": 15,
    "total": 5,
    "last_page": 1,
    "message": "Shipping methods retrieved successfully.",
    "status": 200
}

Example response (403, Insufficient permissions):


{
    "message": "You do not have the required permissions."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/admin/shipping-methods

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

carrier   string  optional  

optional Filter by carrier name (partial match supported). Example: royal-mail

is_active   boolean  optional  

optional Filter by active status. Example: true

page   integer  optional  

optional Page number for pagination. Default: 1. Example: 1

per_page   integer  optional  

optional Number of methods per page (max 100). Default: 15. Example: 25

Create a new shipping method

requires authentication

Create a new shipping method with carrier details, delivery estimates, and configuration options. The system validates that the service code is unique and the carrier configuration is valid. This method defines how products are shipped and affects checkout options.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-methods" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"Premium Delivery\",
    \"description\": \"Express delivery with insurance\",
    \"carrier\": \"UPS\",
    \"service_code\": \"ups-express\",
    \"estimated_days_min\": 19,
    \"estimated_days_max\": 17,
    \"is_active\": true,
    \"sort_order\": 3,
    \"estimated_delivery\": \"1-2 days\",
    \"min_delivery_days\": 1,
    \"max_delivery_days\": 2,
    \"is_default\": false,
    \"supports_tracking\": true,
    \"requires_signature\": true,
    \"max_weight\": 25000,
    \"max_dimensions\": {
        \"length\": 100,
        \"width\": 60,
        \"height\": 60
    },
    \"carrier_config\": {
        \"api_key\": \"ups_api_key\",
        \"account_number\": \"12345\"
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-methods"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "name": "Premium Delivery",
    "description": "Express delivery with insurance",
    "carrier": "UPS",
    "service_code": "ups-express",
    "estimated_days_min": 19,
    "estimated_days_max": 17,
    "is_active": true,
    "sort_order": 3,
    "estimated_delivery": "1-2 days",
    "min_delivery_days": 1,
    "max_delivery_days": 2,
    "is_default": false,
    "supports_tracking": true,
    "requires_signature": true,
    "max_weight": 25000,
    "max_dimensions": {
        "length": 100,
        "width": 60,
        "height": 60
    },
    "carrier_config": {
        "api_key": "ups_api_key",
        "account_number": "12345"
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-methods';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'name' => 'Premium Delivery',
            'description' => 'Express delivery with insurance',
            'carrier' => 'UPS',
            'service_code' => 'ups-express',
            'estimated_days_min' => 19,
            'estimated_days_max' => 17,
            'is_active' => true,
            'sort_order' => 3,
            'estimated_delivery' => '1-2 days',
            'min_delivery_days' => 1,
            'max_delivery_days' => 2,
            'is_default' => false,
            'supports_tracking' => true,
            'requires_signature' => true,
            'max_weight' => 25000,
            'max_dimensions' => [
                'length' => 100,
                'width' => 60,
                'height' => 60,
            ],
            'carrier_config' => [
                'api_key' => 'ups_api_key',
                'account_number' => '12345',
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-methods'
payload = {
    "name": "Premium Delivery",
    "description": "Express delivery with insurance",
    "carrier": "UPS",
    "service_code": "ups-express",
    "estimated_days_min": 19,
    "estimated_days_max": 17,
    "is_active": true,
    "sort_order": 3,
    "estimated_delivery": "1-2 days",
    "min_delivery_days": 1,
    "max_delivery_days": 2,
    "is_default": false,
    "supports_tracking": true,
    "requires_signature": true,
    "max_weight": 25000,
    "max_dimensions": {
        "length": 100,
        "width": 60,
        "height": 60
    },
    "carrier_config": {
        "api_key": "ups_api_key",
        "account_number": "12345"
    }
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()

Example response (200, Shipping method created successfully):


{
    "message": "Shipping method created successfully.",
    "data": {
        "id": 6,
        "name": "Premium Delivery",
        "carrier": "UPS",
        "service_code": "ups-express",
        "description": "Express delivery with insurance",
        "estimated_delivery": "1-2 days",
        "min_delivery_days": 1,
        "max_delivery_days": 2,
        "is_active": true,
        "is_default": false,
        "supports_tracking": true,
        "requires_signature": true,
        "max_weight": 25000,
        "max_dimensions": {
            "length": 100,
            "width": 60,
            "height": 60
        },
        "sort_order": 3,
        "created_at": "2025-01-15T10:30:00.000000Z",
        "updated_at": "2025-01-15T10:30:00.000000Z"
    }
}

Example response (403, Insufficient permissions):


{
    "message": "You do not have the required permissions."
}

Example response (422, Validation errors):


{
    "errors": [
        "The name field is required.",
        "The service code must be unique.",
        "The max delivery days must be greater than or equal to min delivery days."
    ]
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/admin/shipping-methods

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

name   string   

The display name for the shipping method. Example: Premium Delivery

description   string  optional  

optional Detailed description of the shipping method. Example: Express delivery with insurance

carrier   string   

The carrier company name. Example: UPS

service_code   string   

Unique service identifier for the carrier. Example: ups-express

estimated_days_min   integer   

Must be at least 0. Must not be greater than 365. Example: 19

estimated_days_max   integer   

Must be at least 0. Must not be greater than 365. Example: 17

is_active   boolean  optional  

optional Whether method is active. Default: true. Example: true

sort_order   integer  optional  

optional Display order. Example: 3

metadata   object  optional  
estimated_delivery   string   

Human-readable delivery estimate. Example: 1-2 days

min_delivery_days   integer   

Minimum delivery days. Example: 1

max_delivery_days   integer   

Maximum delivery days. Example: 2

is_default   boolean  optional  

optional Whether this is the default method. Default: false. Example: false

supports_tracking   boolean  optional  

optional Whether tracking is supported. Default: true. Example: true

requires_signature   boolean  optional  

optional Whether signature is required. Default: false. Example: true

max_weight   integer  optional  

optional Maximum weight in grams. Example: 25000

max_dimensions   object  optional  

optional Maximum dimensions in cm.

carrier_config   object  optional  

optional Carrier-specific configuration.

Retrieve a specific shipping method

requires authentication

Get detailed information about a specific shipping method including zone and rate counts, carrier configuration, and all method settings. Useful for viewing complete method configuration and understanding its relationship to zones and rates.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-methods/1" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-methods/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-methods/1';
$response = $client->get(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-methods/1'
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('GET', url, headers=headers)
response.json()

Example response (200, Shipping method found):


{
    "message": "Shipping method retrieved successfully.",
    "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "Standard Delivery",
        "carrier": "Royal Mail",
        "service_code": "tracked-48",
        "description": "Tracked delivery within 2-3 working days",
        "estimated_delivery": "2-3 days",
        "min_delivery_days": 2,
        "max_delivery_days": 3,
        "is_active": true,
        "is_default": false,
        "supports_tracking": true,
        "requires_signature": false,
        "max_weight": 20000,
        "max_dimensions": {
            "length": 60,
            "width": 46,
            "height": 46
        },
        "sort_order": 1,
        "zones_count": 3,
        "rates_count": 12,
        "carrier_config": {
            "api_endpoint": "https://api.royalmail.com",

        "created_at": "2025-01-10T09:00:00.000000Z",
        "updated_at": "2025-01-14T14:30:00.000000Z"
    }
}

{
    "message": "You do not have the required permissions."
}

{
    "message": "No query results for model [App\\Models\\ShippingMethod] 999"
}
