Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/admin/shipping-methods/{shippingMethod_id}

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

shippingMethod_id   integer   

The ID of the shippingMethod. Example: 1

shippingMethod   integer   

The ID of the shipping method to retrieve. Example: 1

Update an existing shipping method

requires authentication

Update a shipping method's configuration, delivery estimates, and settings. The system validates that any service code changes don't conflict with existing methods. Changes to active status will immediately affect checkout options for customers.

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-methods/1" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"Standard Delivery Updated\",
    \"description\": \"Updated tracked delivery within 2-3 working days\",
    \"carrier\": \"Royal Mail\",
    \"service_code\": \"tracked-48-updated\",
    \"estimated_days_min\": 19,
    \"estimated_days_max\": 17,
    \"is_active\": true,
    \"sort_order\": 1,
    \"estimated_delivery\": \"2-4 days\",
    \"min_delivery_days\": 2,
    \"max_delivery_days\": 4,
    \"is_default\": false,
    \"supports_tracking\": true,
    \"requires_signature\": false,
    \"max_weight\": 22000,
    \"max_dimensions\": {
        \"length\": 65,
        \"width\": 50,
        \"height\": 50
    },
    \"carrier_config\": {
        \"api_endpoint\": \"https:\\/\\/api.royalmail.com\\/v2\",
        \"account_id\": \"RM123456\"
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-methods/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "name": "Standard Delivery Updated",
    "description": "Updated tracked delivery within 2-3 working days",
    "carrier": "Royal Mail",
    "service_code": "tracked-48-updated",
    "estimated_days_min": 19,
    "estimated_days_max": 17,
    "is_active": true,
    "sort_order": 1,
    "estimated_delivery": "2-4 days",
    "min_delivery_days": 2,
    "max_delivery_days": 4,
    "is_default": false,
    "supports_tracking": true,
    "requires_signature": false,
    "max_weight": 22000,
    "max_dimensions": {
        "length": 65,
        "width": 50,
        "height": 50
    },
    "carrier_config": {
        "api_endpoint": "https:\/\/api.royalmail.com\/v2",
        "account_id": "RM123456"
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "PUT",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-methods/1';
$response = $client->put(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'name' => 'Standard Delivery Updated',
            'description' => 'Updated tracked delivery within 2-3 working days',
            'carrier' => 'Royal Mail',
            'service_code' => 'tracked-48-updated',
            'estimated_days_min' => 19,
            'estimated_days_max' => 17,
            'is_active' => true,
            'sort_order' => 1,
            'estimated_delivery' => '2-4 days',
            'min_delivery_days' => 2,
            'max_delivery_days' => 4,
            'is_default' => false,
            'supports_tracking' => true,
            'requires_signature' => false,
            'max_weight' => 22000,
            'max_dimensions' => [
                'length' => 65,
                'width' => 50,
                'height' => 50,
            ],
            'carrier_config' => [
                'api_endpoint' => 'https://api.royalmail.com/v2',
                'account_id' => 'RM123456',
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-methods/1'
payload = {
    "name": "Standard Delivery Updated",
    "description": "Updated tracked delivery within 2-3 working days",
    "carrier": "Royal Mail",
    "service_code": "tracked-48-updated",
    "estimated_days_min": 19,
    "estimated_days_max": 17,
    "is_active": true,
    "sort_order": 1,
    "estimated_delivery": "2-4 days",
    "min_delivery_days": 2,
    "max_delivery_days": 4,
    "is_default": false,
    "supports_tracking": true,
    "requires_signature": false,
    "max_weight": 22000,
    "max_dimensions": {
        "length": 65,
        "width": 50,
        "height": 50
    },
    "carrier_config": {
        "api_endpoint": "https:\/\/api.royalmail.com\/v2",
        "account_id": "RM123456"
    }
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('PUT', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()

Example response (200, Shipping method updated successfully):


{
    "message": "Shipping method updated successfully.",
    "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "Standard Delivery Updated",
        "carrier": "Royal Mail",
        "service_code": "tracked-48",
        "description": "Updated tracked delivery within 2-3 working days",
        "estimated_delivery": "2-4 days",
        "min_delivery_days": 2,
        "max_delivery_days": 4,
        "is_active": true,
        "max_weight": 22000,
        "updated_at": "2025-01-15T11:45:00.000000Z"
    }
}

Example response (403, Insufficient permissions):


{
    "message": "You do not have the required permissions."
}

Example response (404, Shipping method not found):


{
    "message": "No query results for model [App\\Models\\ShippingMethod] 999"
}

Example response (422, Validation errors):


{
    "errors": [
        "The service code must be unique.",
        "The max delivery days must be greater than or equal to min delivery days."
    ]
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

PUT api/admin/shipping-methods/{shippingMethod_id}

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

shippingMethod_id   integer   

The ID of the shippingMethod. Example: 1

shippingMethod   integer   

The ID of the shipping method to update. Example: 1

Body Parameters

name   string  optional  

optional The display name for the shipping method. Example: Standard Delivery Updated

description   string  optional  

optional Detailed description of the shipping method. Example: Updated tracked delivery within 2-3 working days

carrier   string  optional  

optional The carrier company name. Example: Royal Mail

service_code   string  optional  

optional Unique service identifier for the carrier. Example: tracked-48-updated

estimated_days_min   integer   

Must be at least 0. Must not be greater than 365. Example: 19

estimated_days_max   integer   

Must be at least 0. Must not be greater than 365. Example: 17

is_active   boolean  optional  

optional Whether method is active. Example: true

sort_order   integer  optional  

optional Display order. Example: 1

metadata   object  optional  
estimated_delivery   string  optional  

optional Human-readable delivery estimate. Example: 2-4 days

min_delivery_days   integer  optional  

optional Minimum delivery days. Example: 2

max_delivery_days   integer  optional  

optional Maximum delivery days. Example: 4

is_default   boolean  optional  

optional Whether this is the default method. Example: false

supports_tracking   boolean  optional  

optional Whether tracking is supported. Example: true

requires_signature   boolean  optional  

optional Whether signature is required. Example: false

max_weight   integer  optional  

optional Maximum weight in grams. Example: 22000

max_dimensions   object  optional  

optional Maximum dimensions in cm.

carrier_config   object  optional  

optional Carrier-specific configuration.

Delete a shipping method

requires authentication

Delete a shipping method from the system. This action cannot be performed if the method has been used in orders or has associated shipments. The system also removes all related zones and rates when the method is successfully deleted.

Example request:
curl --request DELETE \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-methods/1" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-methods/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "DELETE",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-methods/1';
$response = $client->delete(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-methods/1'
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('DELETE', url, headers=headers)
response.json()

Example response (200, Shipping method deleted successfully):


{
    "message": "Shipping method deleted successfully."
}

Example response (400, Cannot delete method with orders):


{
    "message": "Cannot delete shipping method that has been used in orders."
}

Example response (400, Cannot delete method with shipments):


{
    "message": "Cannot delete shipping method that has associated shipments."
}

Example response (403, Insufficient permissions):


{
    "message": "You do not have the required permissions."
}

Example response (404, Shipping method not found):


{
    "message": "No query results for model [App\\Models\\ShippingMethod] 999"
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Activate a shipping method

requires authentication

Activate a shipping method, making it available for use in orders and visible to customers during checkout. This enables the method to appear in shipping options and be selected for order fulfillment.

Example request:
curl --request PATCH \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-methods/1/activate" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-methods/1/activate"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "PATCH",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-methods/1/activate';
$response = $client->patch(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('PATCH', url, headers=headers)
response.json()

    "message": "Shipping method activated successfully.",
    "data": {
        "id": 1,

        "carrier": "Royal Mail",
        "service_code": "tracked-48",
        "is_active": true,
        "updated_at": "2025-01-15T12:00:00.000000Z"
    }
}

    "message": "You do not have the required permissions."
}

    "message": "No query results for model [App\\Models\\ShippingMethod] 999"
}

The ID of the shippingMethod. Example: 1

shippingMethod   integer

Deactivate a shipping method

requires authentication

Deactivate a shipping method, preventing it from being used in new orders and removing it from customer checkout options. Existing orders and shipments using this method are not affected by this change.

Example request:
curl --request PATCH \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-methods/1/deactivate" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-methods/1/deactivate"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "PATCH",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-methods/1/deactivate';
$response = $client->patch(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',

Reorder shipping methods

requires authentication

Update the display order of shipping methods by providing an array of method IDs in the desired order. This affects how methods are presented to customers during checkout, with lower sort orders appearing first in the list.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-methods/reorder" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"methods\": [
        2,
        1,
        3,
        4,
        5
    ]
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-methods/reorder"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "methods": [
        2,
        1,
        3,
        4,
        5
    ]
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-methods/reorder';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'methods' => [
                2,
                1,
                3,
                4,
                5,
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-methods/reorder'
payload = {
    "methods": [
        2,
        1,
        3,
        4,
        5
    ]
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()

Example response (200, Shipping methods reordered successfully):


{
    "message": "Shipping methods reordered successfully."
}

Example response (403, Insufficient permissions):


{
    "message": "You do not have the required permissions."
}

Example response (422, Validation errors):


{
    "errors": [
        "The methods field is required.",
        "The methods.0 field must be an integer.",
        "The methods.1 field must exist in shipping_methods table."
    ]
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/admin/shipping-methods/reorder

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

methods   string[]   

Array of shipping method IDs in desired order.
*   integer   

Each method ID must be a valid shipping method ID. Example: 1

Shipping Rate Management

Retrieve paginated list of shipping rates

requires authentication

Get a paginated list of all shipping rates in the system with comprehensive filtering options. This endpoint supports filtering by shipping method, zone, active status, rate ranges, and weight/total thresholds. Essential for managing shipping costs and rate structures.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates?shipping_method_id=1&shipping_zone_id=2&is_active=1&min_rate=5.00&max_rate=15.00&weight_range=2.5&total_range=50.00&with_relationships=1&page=1&per_page=25" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates"
);

const params = {
    "shipping_method_id": "1",
    "shipping_zone_id": "2",
    "is_active": "1",
    "min_rate": "5.00",
    "max_rate": "15.00",
    "weight_range": "2.5",
    "total_range": "50.00",
    "with_relationships": "1",
    "page": "1",
    "per_page": "25",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates';
$response = $client->get(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'query' => [
            'shipping_method_id' => '1',
            'shipping_zone_id' => '2',
            'is_active' => '1',
            'min_rate' => '5.00',
            'max_rate' => '15.00',
            'weight_range' => '2.5',
            'total_range' => '50.00',
            'with_relationships' => '1',
            'page' => '1',
            'per_page' => '25',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates'
params = {
  'shipping_method_id': '1',
  'shipping_zone_id': '2',
  'is_active': '1',
  'min_rate': '5.00',
  'max_rate': '15.00',
  'weight_range': '2.5',
  'total_range': '50.00',
  'with_relationships': '1',
  'page': '1',
  'per_page': '25',
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('GET', url, headers=headers, params=params)
response.json()

Example response (200, Success with shipping rates):


{
    "data": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "shipping_method_id": 1,
            "shipping_zone_id": 1,
            "min_weight": 0,
            "max_weight": 2000,
            "min_total": 0,
            "max_total": 5000,
            "rate": 599,
            "rate_formatted": "£5.99",
            "free_threshold": 10000,
            "free_threshold_formatted": "£100.00",
            "is_active": true,
            "shipping_method": {
                "id": 1,
                "name": "Standard Delivery",
                "carrier": "Royal Mail",
                "service_code": "tracked-48"
            },
            "shipping_zone": {
                "id": 1,
                "name": "UK Mainland",
                "countries": [
                    "GB"
                ],
                "is_active": true
            },
            "created_at": "2025-01-10T09:00:00.000000Z",
            "updated_at": "2025-01-14T14:30:00.000000Z"
        },
        {
            "id": 2,
            "shipping_method_id": 1,
            "shipping_zone_id": 1,
            "min_weight": 2000,
            "max_weight": 5000,
            "min_total": 0,
            "max_total": 5000,
            "rate": 799,
            "rate_formatted": "£7.99",
            "free_threshold": 10000,
            "free_threshold_formatted": "£100.00",
            "is_active": true,
            "shipping_method": {
                "id": 1,
                "name": "Standard Delivery",
                "carrier": "Royal Mail",
                "service_code": "tracked-48"
            },
            "shipping_zone": {
                "id": 1,
                "name": "UK Mainland",
                "countries": [
                    "GB"
                ],
                "is_active": true
            },
            "created_at": "2025-01-10T09:15:00.000000Z",
            "updated_at": "2025-01-14T14:30:00.000000Z"
        }
    ],
    "current_page": 1,
    "per_page": 15,
    "total": 47,
    "last_page": 4,
    "message": "Shipping rates retrieved successfully.",
    "status": 200
}

Example response (403, Insufficient permissions):


{
    "message": "You do not have the required permissions."
}
Received response:

Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/admin/shipping-rates

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

shipping_method_id   integer  optional  

optional Filter by shipping method ID. Example: 1

shipping_zone_id   integer  optional  

optional Filter by shipping zone ID. Example: 2

is_active   boolean  optional  

optional Filter by active status. Example: true

min_rate   string  optional  

numeric optional Filter rates above this amount (in pounds). Example: 5.00

max_rate   string  optional  

numeric optional Filter rates below this amount (in pounds). Example: 15.00

weight_range   string  optional  

numeric optional Filter rates applicable to this weight (in kg). Example: 2.5

total_range   string  optional  

numeric optional Filter rates applicable to this order total (in pounds). Example: 50.00

with_relationships   boolean  optional  

optional Include shipping method and zone details. Example: true

page   integer  optional  

optional Page number for pagination. Default: 1. Example: 1

per_page   integer  optional  

optional Number of rates per page (max 100). Default: 15. Example: 25

Create a new shipping rate

requires authentication

Create a new shipping rate for a specific shipping method and zone combination. The system validates that the rate doesn't overlap with existing rates and that the weight and total thresholds are logically consistent.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"shipping_method_id\": 1,
    \"shipping_zone_id\": 1,
    \"min_weight\": \"0\",
    \"max_weight\": \"2000\",
    \"min_total\": \"0\",
    \"max_total\": \"50.00\",
    \"rate\": \"5.99\",
    \"free_threshold\": \"100.00\",
    \"is_active\": true,
    \"with_relationships\": true
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "shipping_method_id": 1,
    "shipping_zone_id": 1,
    "min_weight": "0",
    "max_weight": "2000",
    "min_total": "0",
    "max_total": "50.00",
    "rate": "5.99",
    "free_threshold": "100.00",
    "is_active": true,
    "with_relationships": true
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'shipping_method_id' => 1,
            'shipping_zone_id' => 1,
            'min_weight' => '0',
            'max_weight' => '2000',
            'min_total' => '0',
            'max_total' => '50.00',
            'rate' => '5.99',
            'free_threshold' => '100.00',
            'is_active' => true,
            'with_relationships' => true,
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates'
payload = {
    "shipping_method_id": 1,
    "shipping_zone_id": 1,
    "min_weight": "0",
    "max_weight": "2000",
    "min_total": "0",
    "max_total": "50.00",
    "rate": "5.99",
    "free_threshold": "100.00",
    "is_active": true,
    "with_relationships": true
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()

Example response (200, Shipping rate created successfully):


{
    "message": "Shipping rate created successfully.",
    "data": {
        "id": 48,
        "shipping_method_id": 1,
        "shipping_zone_id": 1,
        "min_weight": 0,
        "max_weight": 2000,
        "min_total": 0,
        "max_total": 5000,
        "rate": 599,
        "rate_formatted": "£5.99",
        "free_threshold": 10000,
        "free_threshold_formatted": "£100.00",
        "is_active": true,
        "shipping_method": {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "Standard Delivery",
            "carrier": "Royal Mail",
            "service_code": "tracked-48"
        },
        "shipping_zone": {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "UK Mainland",
            "countries": [
                "GB"
            ],
            "is_active": true
        },
        "created_at": "2025-01-15T10:30:00.000000Z",
        "updated_at": "2025-01-15T10:30:00.000000Z"
    }
}

Example response (403, Insufficient permissions):


{
    "message": "You do not have the required permissions."
}

Example response (422, Validation errors):


{
    "errors": [
        "The shipping method id field is required.",
        "The shipping zone id field is required.",
        "The rate field is required.",
        "The max weight must be greater than min weight."
    ]
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/admin/shipping-rates

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

shipping_method_id   integer   

The ID of the shipping method. Example: 1

shipping_zone_id   integer   

The ID of the shipping zone. Example: 1

min_weight   numeric   

Minimum weight in grams. Example: 0

max_weight   numeric  optional  

optional Maximum weight in grams (null for unlimited). Example: 2000

min_total   numeric   

Minimum order total in pounds. Example: 0

max_total   numeric  optional  

optional Maximum order total in pounds (null for unlimited). Example: 50.00

rate   numeric   

Shipping rate in pounds. Example: 5.99

free_threshold   numeric  optional  

optional Order total for free shipping in pounds. Example: 100.00

is_active   boolean  optional  

optional Whether the rate is active. Default: true. Example: true

with_relationships   boolean  optional  

optional Include related method and zone in response. Example: true

Retrieve a specific shipping rate

requires authentication

Get detailed information about a specific shipping rate including its weight and total thresholds, pricing, and optionally the related shipping method and zone details. Useful for viewing complete rate configuration.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates/1?with_relationships=1" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates/1"
);

const params = {
    "with_relationships": "1",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates/1';
$response = $client->get(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'query' => [
            'with_relationships' => '1',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates/1'
params = {
  'with_relationships': '1',
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('GET', url, headers=headers, params=params)
response.json()

        "id": 1,
        "shipping_method_id": 1,
        "shipping_zone_id": 1,

        "max_weight": 2000,
        "min_total": 0,
        "max_total": 5000,
        "rate": 599,
        "rate_formatted": "£5.99",
        "free_threshold": 10000,
        "free_threshold_formatted": "£100.00",
        "is_active": true,

            "id": 1,
            "name": "Standard Delivery",
            "carrier": "Royal Mail",
            "service_code": "tracked-48",
            "estimated_delivery": "2-3 days"
        },
        "shipping_zone": {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "UK Mainland",
            "countries": [
                "GB"
            ],
            "postcodes": [
                "SW1A",
                "E1",
                "M1"
            ],
            "is_active": true
        },
        "created_at": "2025-01-10T09:00:00.000000Z",
        "updated_at": "2025-01-14T14:30:00.000000Z"
    }

Request      

GET api/admin/shipping-rates/{shippingRate_id}

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

shippingRate_id   integer   

The ID of the shippingRate. Example: 1

shippingRate   integer   

The ID of the shipping rate to retrieve. Example: 1

Query Parameters

with_relationships   boolean  optional  

optional Include shipping method and zone details. Example: true

Update an existing shipping rate

requires authentication

Update a shipping rate's thresholds, pricing, and configuration. The system validates that the updated rate doesn't create conflicts with existing rates and that the weight and total thresholds remain logically consistent.

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates/1" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"shipping_method_id\": 1,
    \"shipping_zone_id\": 1,
    \"min_weight\": \"0\",
    \"max_weight\": \"2500\",
    \"min_total\": \"0\",
    \"max_total\": \"75.00\",
    \"rate\": \"6.99\",
    \"free_threshold\": \"125.00\",
    \"is_active\": true,
    \"with_relationships\": true
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "shipping_method_id": 1,
    "shipping_zone_id": 1,
    "min_weight": "0",
    "max_weight": "2500",
    "min_total": "0",
    "max_total": "75.00",
    "rate": "6.99",
    "free_threshold": "125.00",
    "is_active": true,
    "with_relationships": true
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "PUT",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates/1';
$response = $client->put(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'shipping_method_id' => 1,
            'shipping_zone_id' => 1,
            'min_weight' => '0',
            'max_weight' => '2500',
            'min_total' => '0',
            'max_total' => '75.00',
            'rate' => '6.99',
            'free_threshold' => '125.00',
            'is_active' => true,
            'with_relationships' => true,
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

import json

    "shipping_method_id": 1,

    "max_total": "75.00",

    "is_active": true,
    "with_relationships": true

  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response.json()

        "rate": 699,

        "free_threshold_formatted": "£125.00",

            "id": 1,

optional The ID of the shipping method. Example: 1

optional The ID of the shipping zone. Example: 1

min_weight   numeric  optional  

optional Minimum weight in grams. Example: 0

max_weight   numeric  optional  

optional Maximum weight in grams (null for unlimited). Example: 2500

min_total   numeric  optional  

optional Minimum order total in pounds. Example: 0

max_total   numeric  optional  

optional Maximum order total in pounds (null for unlimited). Example: 75.00

optional Shipping rate in pounds. Example: 6.99

optional Whether the rate is active. Example: true

with_relationships   boolean  optional  

optional Include related method and zone in response. Example: true

Delete a shipping rate

requires authentication

Delete a shipping rate from the system. This removes the rate permanently and may affect shipping calculations if this was the only rate for a specific weight/total combination. Use with caution as this cannot be undone.

Example request:
curl --request DELETE \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates/1" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "DELETE",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates/1';
$response = $client->delete(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

import json

  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',

shippingRate_id   integer   

The ID of the shippingRate. Example: 1

shippingRate   integer

Activate a shipping rate

requires authentication

Activate a shipping rate, making it available for shipping calculations. This enables the rate to be used when determining shipping costs for orders that match its weight and total criteria.

Example request:
curl --request PATCH \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates/1/activate" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates/1/activate"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "PATCH",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates/1/activate';
$response = $client->patch(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

import json

The ID of the shippingRate. Example: 1

Deactivate a shipping rate

requires authentication

Deactivate a shipping rate, removing it from shipping calculations. This prevents the rate from being used for new orders while preserving the rate configuration for potential future reactivation.

Example request:
curl --request PATCH \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates/1/deactivate" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates/1/deactivate"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "PATCH",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates/1/deactivate';
$response = $client->patch(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

Request      

PATCH api/admin/shipping-rates/{shippingRate_id}/deactivate

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

shippingRate_id   integer   

The ID of the shippingRate. Example: 1

shippingRate   integer   

The ID of the shipping rate to deactivate. Example: 1

Bulk create shipping rates

requires authentication

Create multiple shipping rates in a single request. This is useful for setting up complete rate structures for new shipping methods or zones. The system validates each rate and prevents creation of overlapping rates.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates/bulk-create" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"rates\": [
        {
            \"shipping_method_id\": 1,
            \"shipping_zone_id\": 1,
            \"min_weight\": 0,
            \"max_weight\": 1000,
            \"min_total\": 0,
            \"max_total\": 25,
            \"rate\": 4.99
        },
        {
            \"shipping_method_id\": 1,
            \"shipping_zone_id\": 1,
            \"min_weight\": 1000,
            \"max_weight\": 2000,
            \"min_total\": 0,
            \"max_total\": 25,
            \"rate\": 6.99
        }
    ]
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates/bulk-create"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "rates": [
        {
            "shipping_method_id": 1,
            "shipping_zone_id": 1,
            "min_weight": 0,
            "max_weight": 1000,
            "min_total": 0,
            "max_total": 25,
            "rate": 4.99
        },
        {
            "shipping_method_id": 1,
            "shipping_zone_id": 1,
            "min_weight": 1000,
            "max_weight": 2000,
            "min_total": 0,
            "max_total": 25,
            "rate": 6.99
        }
    ]
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates/bulk-create';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => \Symfony\Component\VarExporter\Internal\Hydrator::hydrate(
            $o = [
                clone (($p = &\Symfony\Component\VarExporter\Internal\Registry::$prototypes)['stdClass'] ?? \Symfony\Component\VarExporter\Internal\Registry::p('stdClass')),
                clone $p['stdClass'],
            ],
            null,
            [
                'stdClass' => [
                    'shipping_method_id' => [
                        1,
                        1,
                    ],
                    'shipping_zone_id' => [
                        1,
                        1,
                    ],
                    'min_weight' => [
                        0,
                        1000,
                    ],
                    'max_weight' => [
                        1000,
                        2000,
                    ],
                    'min_total' => [
                        0,
                        0,
                    ],
                    'max_total' => [
                        25.0,
                        25.0,
                    ],
                    'rate' => [
                        4.99,
                        6.99,
                    ],
                ],
            ],
            [
                'rates' => [
                    $o[0],
                    $o[1],
                ],
            ],
            []
        ),
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates/bulk-create'
payload = {
    "rates": [
        {
            "shipping_method_id": 1,
            "shipping_zone_id": 1,
            "min_weight": 0,
            "max_weight": 1000,
            "min_total": 0,
            "max_total": 25,
            "rate": 4.99
        },
        {
            "shipping_method_id": 1,
            "shipping_zone_id": 1,
            "min_weight": 1000,
            "max_weight": 2000,
            "min_total": 0,
            "max_total": 25,
            "rate": 6.99
        }
    ]
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()

Example response (200, Shipping rates created successfully):


{
    "message": "15 shipping rates created successfully.",
    "data": {
        "created_count": 15
    }
}

Example response (403, Insufficient permissions):


{
    "message": "You do not have the required permissions."
}

Example response (422, Validation errors with conflicts):


{
    "message": "Some rates could not be created due to conflicts.",
    "errors": [
        "Rate 0: Overlapping rate already exists for this method/zone combination.",
        "Rate 3: The max weight must be greater than min weight."
    ]
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/admin/shipping-rates/bulk-create

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

rates   string[]   

Array of shipping rates to create (max 50).
shipping_method_id   integer   

The id of an existing record in the shipping_methods table. Example: 16

shipping_zone_id   integer   

The id of an existing record in the shipping_zones table. Example: 16

min_weight   number   

Must be at least 0. Example: 39

max_weight   number  optional  

Must be at least 0. Example: 84

min_total   number   

Must be at least 0. Example: 12

max_total   number  optional  

Must be at least 0. Example: 77

rate   number   

Must be at least 0. Example: 8

free_threshold   number  optional  

Must be at least 0. Example: 76

is_active   boolean  optional  

Example: true

*   object  optional  
shipping_method_id   integer   

The ID of the shipping method. Example: 1

shipping_zone_id   integer   

The ID of the shipping zone. Example: 1

min_weight   numeric   

Minimum weight in grams. Example: 0

max_weight   numeric  optional  

optional Maximum weight in grams. Example: 1000

min_total   numeric   

Minimum order total in pounds. Example: 0

max_total   numeric  optional  

optional Maximum order total in pounds. Example: 25.00

rate   numeric   

Shipping rate in pounds. Example: 4.99

free_threshold   numeric  optional  

optional Order total for free shipping in pounds. Example: 100.00

is_active   boolean  optional  

optional Whether the rate is active. Default: true. Example: true

Bulk update shipping rates

requires authentication

Update multiple shipping rates with the same changes in a single request. This is useful for applying price changes, threshold adjustments, or status changes to multiple rates simultaneously.

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates/bulk-update" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"rate_ids\": [
        1,
        2,
        3,
        4,
        5
    ],
    \"updates\": {
        \"rate\": 7.99,
        \"free_threshold\": 150,
        \"is_active\": true
    }
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates/bulk-update"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "rate_ids": [
        1,
        2,
        3,
        4,
        5
    ],
    "updates": {
        "rate": 7.99,
        "free_threshold": 150,
        "is_active": true
    }
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "PUT",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates/bulk-update';
$response = $client->put(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'rate_ids' => [
                1,
                2,
                3,
                4,
                5,
            ],
            'updates' => [
                'rate' => 7.99,
                'free_threshold' => 150.0,
                'is_active' => true,
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates/bulk-update'
payload = {
    "rate_ids": [
        1,
        2,
        3,
        4,
        5
    ],
    "updates": {
        "rate": 7.99,
        "free_threshold": 150,
        "is_active": true
    }
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('PUT', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()

Example response (200, Shipping rates updated successfully):


{
    "message": "5 shipping rates updated successfully.",
    "data": {
        "updated_count": 5
    }
}

Example response (403, Insufficient permissions):


{
    "message": "You do not have the required permissions."
}

Example response (422, Validation errors):


{
    "errors": [
        "The rate ids field is required.",
        "The updates field is required.",
        "The updates.rate must be a positive number."
    ]
}

Example response (422, No valid updates):


{
    "message": "No valid updates provided."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

PUT api/admin/shipping-rates/bulk-update

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

rate_ids   string[]   

Array of shipping rate IDs to update.
*   integer   

Each rate ID must be a valid shipping rate ID. Example: 1

updates   object   

Object containing the fields to update.
rate   numeric  optional  

optional New shipping rate in pounds. Example: 7.99

free_threshold   numeric  optional  

optional New free shipping threshold in pounds. Example: 150.00

is_active   boolean  optional  

optional New active status. Example: true

Duplicate shipping rate to other zones

requires authentication

Duplicate an existing shipping rate to other zones, maintaining the same weight and total thresholds but applying them to different geographical areas. This is useful for setting up similar rates across multiple zones.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates/1/duplicate" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"shipping_zone_ids\": [
        2,
        3,
        4
    ]
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates/1/duplicate"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "shipping_zone_ids": [
        2,
        3,
        4
    ]
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates/1/duplicate';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'shipping_zone_ids' => [
                2,
                3,
                4,
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

payload = {
    "shipping_zone_ids": [
        2,
        3,
        4
    ]
}

  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()

                "shipping_zone_id": 2,
                "min_weight": 0,
                "max_weight": 2000,
                "rate": 599,
                "rate_formatted": "£5.99",
                "is_active": true,

                "rate_formatted": "£5.99",
                "is_active": true,
                "created_at": "2025-01-15T14:20:00.000000Z"

Request      

POST api/admin/shipping-rates/{shippingRate_id}/duplicate

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

shippingRate_id   integer   

The ID of the shippingRate. Example: 1

shippingRate   integer   

The ID of the shipping rate to duplicate. Example: 1

Body Parameters

shipping_zone_ids   string[]   

Array of zone IDs to duplicate the rate to.
*   integer   

Each zone ID must be a valid shipping zone ID. Example: 2

Calculate shipping cost for specific criteria

requires authentication

Calculate the shipping cost for a specific shipping method, zone, weight, and order total. This endpoint is useful for testing rate configurations and understanding how shipping costs are calculated before rates go live.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates/calculate" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"shipping_method_id\": 1,
    \"shipping_zone_id\": 1,
    \"weight\": \"1.5\",
    \"total\": \"45.99\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates/calculate"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "shipping_method_id": 1,
    "shipping_zone_id": 1,
    "weight": "1.5",
    "total": "45.99"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates/calculate';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'shipping_method_id' => 1,
            'shipping_zone_id' => 1,
            'weight' => '1.5',
            'total' => '45.99',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-rates/calculate'
payload = {
    "shipping_method_id": 1,
    "shipping_zone_id": 1,
    "weight": "1.5",
    "total": "45.99"
}

  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response.json()

{
    "message": "Shipping cost calculated successfully.",
    "data": {
        "rate": {
            "id": 1,
            "shipping_method_id": 1,
            "shipping_zone_id": 1,
            "min_weight": 0,
            "max_weight": 2000,
            "min_total": 0,
            "max_total": 5000,
            "rate": 599,
            "rate_formatted": "£5.99",
            "free_threshold": 10000,
            "free_threshold_formatted": "£100.00",
            "is_active": true
        },
        "calculation": {
            "weight": 1.5,
            "total": 4599,
            "total_formatted": "£45.99",
            "shipping_cost": 599,
            "shipping_cost_formatted": "£5.99",
            "is_free": false,
            "free_threshold_met": false
        }
    }
}

{
    "message": "You do not have the required permissions."
}

    "message": "No shipping rate found for the specified criteria."
}

        "The shipping zone id field is required.",
        "The weight field is required.",
        "The total field is required."
    ]

Request      

POST api/admin/shipping-rates/calculate

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

shipping_method_id   integer   

The ID of the shipping method. Example: 1

shipping_zone_id   integer   

The ID of the shipping zone. Example: 1

weight   numeric   

Package weight in kilograms. Example: 1.5

total   numeric   

Order total in pounds. Example: 45.99

Shipping Zone Management

Retrieve paginated list of shipping zones

requires authentication

Get a paginated list of shipping zones with optional filtering by name, country, and active status. Shipping zones define geographic regions with specific shipping rules and available methods. Can include associated shipping methods and counts for comprehensive zone management.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-zones?name=europe&country=GB&is_active=1&with_methods=1&with_counts=1&page=1&per_page=20" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-zones"
);

const params = {
    "name": "europe",
    "country": "GB",
    "is_active": "1",
    "with_methods": "1",
    "with_counts": "1",
    "page": "1",
    "per_page": "20",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-zones';
$response = $client->get(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'query' => [
            'name' => 'europe',
            'country' => 'GB',
            'is_active' => '1',
            'with_methods' => '1',
            'with_counts' => '1',
            'page' => '1',
            'per_page' => '20',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-zones'
params = {
  'name': 'europe',
  'country': 'GB',
  'is_active': '1',
  'with_methods': '1',
  'with_counts': '1',
  'page': '1',
  'per_page': '20',
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('GET', url, headers=headers, params=params)
response.json()

Request      

GET api/admin/shipping-zones

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

name   string  optional  

optional Filter by zone name (partial match supported). Example: europe

country   string  optional  

optional Filter by country code (searches within countries JSON). Example: GB

is_active   boolean  optional  

optional Filter by active status (true/false). Example: true

with_methods   boolean  optional  

optional Include associated shipping methods. Example: true

with_counts   boolean  optional  

optional Include methods and rates counts. Example: true

page   integer  optional  

optional Page number for pagination. Default: 1. Example: 1

per_page   integer  optional  

optional Number of zones per page (max 100). Default: 15. Example: 20

Create a new shipping zone

requires authentication

Create a new shipping zone with countries, postcodes, and configuration. Zones define geographic regions that can have specific shipping methods and rates. Countries must be provided as 2-letter ISO codes, and postcodes support wildcards.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-zones" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"Nordic Countries\",
    \"description\": \"Nordic and Scandinavian countries\",
    \"countries\": [
        \"NO\",
        \"SE\",
        \"DK\",
        \"FI\",
        \"IS\"
    ],
    \"postcodes\": [
        \"0*\",
        \"1*\",
        \"2*\"
    ],
    \"excluded_postcodes\": [
        \"0001\",
        \"0002\"
    ],
    \"is_active\": true,
    \"sort_order\": 5
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-zones"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "name": "Nordic Countries",
    "description": "Nordic and Scandinavian countries",
    "countries": [
        "NO",
        "SE",
        "DK",
        "FI",
        "IS"
    ],
    "postcodes": [
        "0*",
        "1*",
        "2*"
    ],
    "excluded_postcodes": [
        "0001",
        "0002"
    ],
    "is_active": true,
    "sort_order": 5
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-zones';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'name' => 'Nordic Countries',
            'description' => 'Nordic and Scandinavian countries',
            'countries' => [
                'NO',
                'SE',
                'DK',
                'FI',
                'IS',
            ],
            'postcodes' => [
                '0*',
                '1*',
                '2*',
            ],
            'excluded_postcodes' => [
                '0001',
                '0002',
            ],
            'is_active' => true,
            'sort_order' => 5,
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-zones'
payload = {
    "name": "Nordic Countries",
    "description": "Nordic and Scandinavian countries",
    "countries": [
        "NO",
        "SE",
        "DK",
        "FI",
        "IS"
    ],
    "postcodes": [
        "0*",
        "1*",
        "2*"
    ],
    "excluded_postcodes": [
        "0001",
        "0002"
    ],
    "is_active": true,
    "sort_order": 5
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()

Example response (200, Shipping zone created successfully):


{
    "message": "Shipping zone created successfully.",
    "data": {
        "id": 9,
        "name": "Nordic Countries",
        "description": "Nordic and Scandinavian countries",
        "countries": [
            "NO",
            "SE",
            "DK",
            "FI",
            "IS"
        ],
        "country_names": [
            "Norway",
            "Sweden",
            "Denmark",
            "Finland",
            "Iceland"
        ],
        "postcodes": [
            "0*",
            "1*",
            "2*"
        ],
        "excluded_postcodes": [
            "0001",
            "0002"
        ],
        "is_active": true,
        "sort_order": 5,
        "methods_count": 0,
        "rates_count": 0,
        "created_at": "2025-01-15T14:30:00.000000Z",
        "updated_at": "2025-01-15T14:30:00.000000Z"
    }
}

Example response (403, Insufficient permissions):


{
    "message": "You do not have the required permissions."
}

Example response (422, Validation errors):


{
    "errors": [
        "The name field is required.",
        "A shipping zone with this name already exists.",
        "The countries field is required.",
        "At least one country must be selected.",
        "Country codes must be uppercase letters only (e.g., GB, US)."
    ]
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/admin/shipping-zones

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

name   string   

Unique name for the shipping zone. Example: Nordic Countries

description   string  optional  

optional Detailed description of the zone. Example: Nordic and Scandinavian countries

countries   string[]   

Array of 2-letter country codes.
*   string   

Each country code must be exactly 2 uppercase letters. Example: NO

postcodes   string[]  optional  

optional Array of postcode patterns (supports wildcards).
*   string  optional  

optional Each postcode pattern (max 50 characters). Example: 0*

excluded_postcodes   string[]  optional  

optional Array of excluded postcode patterns.
*   string  optional  

optional Each excluded postcode pattern (max 50 characters). Example: 0001

is_active   boolean  optional  

optional Whether the zone is active. Default: true. Example: true

sort_order   integer  optional  

optional Display order (lower numbers first). Default: 0. Example: 5

Retrieve a specific shipping zone

requires authentication

Get detailed information about a specific shipping zone including its methods and rates count. Optionally includes associated shipping methods with their zone-specific settings.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-zones/1?with_methods=1" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-zones/1"
);

const params = {
    "with_methods": "1",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-zones/1';
$response = $client->get(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'query' => [
            'with_methods' => '1',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-zones/1'
params = {
  'with_methods': '1',
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('GET', url, headers=headers, params=params)
response.json()

Example response (200, Shipping zone found):


{
    "message": "Shipping zone retrieved successfully.",
    "data": {
        "id": 9,
        "name": "Nordic Countries",
        "description": "Nordic and Scandinavian countries",
        "countries": [
            "NO",
            "SE",
            "DK",
            "FI",
            "IS"
        ],
        "country_names": [
            "Norway",
            "Sweden",
            "Denmark",
            "Finland",
            "Iceland"
        ],
        "postcodes": [
            "0*",
            "1*",
            "2*"
        ],
        "excluded_postcodes": [
            "0001",
            "0002"
        ],
        "is_active": true,
        "sort_order": 5,
        "methods_count": 2,
        "rates_count": 8,
        "available_methods": [
            {
                "id": 3,
                "name": "International Standard",
                "carrier": "Royal Mail",
                "is_active": true,
                "sort_order": 0
            },
            {
                "id": 4,
                "name": "International Express",
                "carrier": "DHL",
                "is_active": true,
                "sort_order": 1
            }
        ],
        "created_at": "2025-01-15T14:30:00.000000Z",
        "updated_at": "2025-01-15T14:30:00.000000Z"
    }
}

Example response (403, Insufficient permissions):


{
    "message": "You do not have the required permissions."
}

Example response (404, Shipping zone not found):


{
    "message": "No query results for model [App\\Models\\ShippingZone] 999"
}

Request      

GET api/admin/shipping-zones/{shippingZone_id}

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

shippingZone_id   integer   

The ID of the shippingZone. Example: 1

shippingZone   integer   

The ID of the shipping zone to retrieve. Example: 9

Query Parameters

with_methods   boolean  optional  

optional Include associated shipping methods. Example: true

Update an existing shipping zone

requires authentication

Update shipping zone details including countries, postcodes, and configuration. Changes to active zones may affect existing shipping calculations and should be used carefully. Country codes will be automatically converted to uppercase.

Example request:
curl --request PUT \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-zones/1" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"Nordic & Baltic Countries\",
    \"description\": \"Nordic, Scandinavian, and Baltic countries\",
    \"countries\": [
        \"NO\",
        \"SE\",
        \"DK\",
        \"FI\",
        \"IS\",
        \"LT\",
        \"LV\",
        \"EE\"
    ],
    \"postcodes\": [
        \"0*\",
        \"1*\",
        \"2*\",
        \"3*\"
    ],
    \"excluded_postcodes\": [
        \"0001\",
        \"0002\",
        \"3999\"
    ],
    \"is_active\": true,
    \"sort_order\": 4
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-zones/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "name": "Nordic & Baltic Countries",
    "description": "Nordic, Scandinavian, and Baltic countries",
    "countries": [
        "NO",
        "SE",
        "DK",
        "FI",
        "IS",
        "LT",
        "LV",
        "EE"
    ],
    "postcodes": [
        "0*",
        "1*",
        "2*",
        "3*"
    ],
    "excluded_postcodes": [
        "0001",
        "0002",
        "3999"
    ],
    "is_active": true,
    "sort_order": 4
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "PUT",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-zones/1';
$response = $client->put(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'name' => 'Nordic & Baltic Countries',
            'description' => 'Nordic, Scandinavian, and Baltic countries',
            'countries' => [
                'NO',
                'SE',
                'DK',
                'FI',
                'IS',
                'LT',
                'LV',
                'EE',
            ],
            'postcodes' => [
                '0*',
                '1*',
                '2*',
                '3*',
            ],
            'excluded_postcodes' => [
                '0001',
                '0002',
                '3999',
            ],
            'is_active' => true,
            'sort_order' => 4,
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-zones/1'
payload = {
    "name": "Nordic & Baltic Countries",
    "description": "Nordic, Scandinavian, and Baltic countries",
    "countries": [
        "NO",
        "SE",
        "DK",
        "FI",
        "IS",
        "LT",
        "LV",
        "EE"
    ],
    "postcodes": [
        "0*",
        "1*",
        "2*",
        "3*"
    ],
    "excluded_postcodes": [
        "0001",
        "0002",
        "3999"
    ],
    "is_active": true,
    "sort_order": 4
}

  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('PUT', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()

    "message": "Shipping zone updated successfully.",
    "data": {
        "id": 9,
        "name": "Nordic & Baltic Countries",
        "description": "Nordic, Scandinavian, and Baltic countries",
        "countries": [
            "NO",
            "SE",
            "DK",
            "FI",
            "IS",
            "LT",
            "LV",
            "EE"
        ],
        "country_names": [
            "Norway",
            "Sweden",
            "Denmark",
            "Finland",
            "Iceland",
            "Lithuania",
            "Latvia",
            "Estonia"
        ],
        "postcodes": [
            "0*",
            "1*",
            "2*",
            "3*"
        ],
        "excluded_postcodes": [
            "0001",
            "0002",
            "3999"
        ],
        "is_active": true,
        "sort_order": 4,
        "methods_count": 2,
        "rates_count": 8,
        "created_at": "2025-01-15T14:30:00.000000Z",

Headers

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

shippingZone_id   integer   

The ID of the shippingZone. Example: 1

shippingZone   integer   

The ID of the shipping zone to update. Example: 9

Body Parameters

name   string  optional  

optional Unique name for the shipping zone. Example: Nordic & Baltic Countries

description   string  optional  

optional Detailed description of the zone. Example: Nordic, Scandinavian, and Baltic countries

countries   string[]  optional  

optional Array of 2-letter country codes.
*   string  optional  

optional Each country code must be exactly 2 uppercase letters. Example: LT

postcodes   string[]  optional  

optional Array of postcode patterns (supports wildcards).
*   string  optional  

optional Each postcode pattern (max 50 characters). Example: 3*

excluded_postcodes   string[]  optional  

optional Array of excluded postcode patterns.
*   string  optional  

optional Each excluded postcode pattern (max 50 characters). Example: 3999

is_active   boolean  optional  

optional Whether the zone is active. Example: true

sort_order   integer  optional  

optional Display order (lower numbers first). Example: 4

Delete a shipping zone

requires authentication

Delete a shipping zone if it has no associated rates. This also removes all method associations. Cannot delete zones that have shipping rates configured as this would affect shipping calculations.

Example request:
curl --request DELETE \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-zones/1" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-zones/1"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "DELETE",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-zones/1';
$response = $client->delete(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/shipping-zones/1'
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('DELETE', url, headers=headers)
response.json()

Example response (200, Shipping zone deleted successfully):


{
    "message": "Shipping zone deleted successfully."
}

    "message": "Cannot delete shipping zone that has associated rates."
}

    "message": "You do not have the required permissions."
}

Headers

Content-Type
