Get integration logs and analytics

requires authentication

Retrieve comprehensive logs and analytics for a supplier integration including sync history, performance metrics, health scores, and operational statistics.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/supplier-integrations/16/logs" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/supplier-integrations/16/logs"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/supplier-integrations/16/logs';
$response = $client->get(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/supplier-integrations/16/logs'
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('GET', url, headers=headers)
response.json()

Example response (200, Logs retrieved successfully):


{
    "message": "Integration logs retrieved successfully.",
    "data": {
        "integration_id": 1,
        "integration_name": "GlobalTech API Integration",
        "last_successful_sync": "2025-01-15T15:30:00.000000Z",
        "last_failed_sync": "2025-01-14T10:15:00.000000Z",
        "consecutive_failures": 0,
        "last_error": null,
        "sync_statistics": {
            "total_syncs": 245,
            "successful_syncs": 241,
            "failed_syncs": 4,
            "products_synced": 1250,
            "orders_sent": 89,
            "last_sync_duration": 8.5,
            "average_sync_duration": 6.2,
            "success_rate": 98.37
        },
        "health_score": 95,
        "health_status": "excellent",
        "success_rate": 98.37,
        "last_sync_status": "success",
        "last_sync_time": "2025-01-15T15:30:00.000000Z",
        "last_sync_ago": "4 hours ago",
        "needs_sync": false,
        "can_retry": true,
        "sync_frequency": "Every 60 minutes"
    }
}

Example response (403, Insufficient permissions):


{
    "message": "You do not have the required permissions."
}

Example response (404, Integration not found):


{
    "message": "No query results for model [App\\Models\\SupplierIntegration] 999"
}

Example response (500, Server error):


{
    "message": "Failed to retrieve logs."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/admin/supplier-integrations/{supplierIntegration_id}/logs

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

supplierIntegration_id   integer   

The ID of the supplierIntegration. Example: 16

supplierIntegration   integer   

The ID of the integration. Example: 1

Supplier Management

Retrieve paginated list of suppliers

requires authentication

Get a paginated list of all suppliers in the system. This endpoint supports filtering by status, integration type, country, and search terms. Includes supplier counts and performance metrics.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/suppliers?status=active&integration_type=api&search=Tech&country=GB&page=1&per_page=20" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"status\": \"inactive\",
    \"integration_type\": \"ftp\",
    \"search\": \"b\",
    \"country\": \"ng\",
    \"auto_fulfill\": true,
    \"stock_sync_enabled\": true,
    \"price_sync_enabled\": true,
    \"page\": 66,
    \"per_page\": 17,
    \"sort_by\": \"processing_time_days\",
    \"sort_direction\": \"desc\"
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/suppliers"
);

const params = {
    "status": "active",
    "integration_type": "api",
    "search": "Tech",
    "country": "GB",
    "page": "1",
    "per_page": "20",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "status": "inactive",
    "integration_type": "ftp",
    "search": "b",
    "country": "ng",
    "auto_fulfill": true,
    "stock_sync_enabled": true,
    "price_sync_enabled": true,
    "page": 66,
    "per_page": 17,
    "sort_by": "processing_time_days",
    "sort_direction": "desc"
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/suppliers';
$response = $client->get(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'query' => [
            'status' => 'active',
            'integration_type' => 'api',
            'search' => 'Tech',
            'country' => 'GB',
            'page' => '1',
            'per_page' => '20',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'status' => 'inactive',
            'integration_type' => 'ftp',
            'search' => 'b',
            'country' => 'ng',
            'auto_fulfill' => true,
            'stock_sync_enabled' => true,
            'price_sync_enabled' => true,
            'page' => 66,
            'per_page' => 17,
            'sort_by' => 'processing_time_days',
            'sort_direction' => 'desc',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/suppliers'
payload = {
    "status": "inactive",
    "integration_type": "ftp",
    "search": "b",
    "country": "ng",
    "auto_fulfill": true,
    "stock_sync_enabled": true,
    "price_sync_enabled": true,
    "page": 66,
    "per_page": 17,
    "sort_by": "processing_time_days",
    "sort_direction": "desc"
}
params = {
  'status': 'active',
  'integration_type': 'api',
  'search': 'Tech',
  'country': 'GB',
  'page': '1',
  'per_page': '20',
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('GET', url, headers=headers, json=payload, params=params)
response.json()

Example response (200, Success with suppliers):


{
    "message": "Suppliers retrieved successfully.",
    "data": {
        "data": [
            {
                "id": 1,
                "name": "GlobalTech Distributors",
                "company_name": "GlobalTech Distributors Ltd",
                "email": "orders@globaltech-dist.com",
                "phone": "+44 20 7946 0958",
                "address": "123 Business Park, London, E14 5AB",
                "country": "GB",
                "contact_person": "Sarah Williams",
                "status": "active",
                "integration_type": "api",
                "commission_rate": 5,
                "processing_time_days": 2,
                "auto_fulfill": true,
                "stock_sync_enabled": true,
                "price_sync_enabled": true,
                "minimum_order_value": 25,
                "maximum_order_value": 5000,
                "supported_countries": [
                    "GB",
                    "IE",
                    "FR",
                    "DE",
                    "NL",
                    "BE"
                ],
                "supplier_products_count": 45,
                "dropship_orders_count": 128,
                "created_at": "2025-01-15T10:30:00.000000Z",
                "updated_at": "2025-01-15T14:25:00.000000Z"
            }
        ],
        "current_page": 1,
        "per_page": 15,
        "total": 6,
        "last_page": 1,
        "from": 1,
        "to": 6
    }
}

Example response (200, No suppliers found):


{
    "message": "Suppliers retrieved successfully.",
    "data": {
        "data": [],
        "current_page": 1,
        "per_page": 15,
        "total": 0,
        "last_page": 1,
        "from": null,
        "to": null
    }
}

Example response (403, Insufficient permissions):


{
    "message": "You do not have the required permissions."
}

Example response (422, Invalid filter parameters):


{
    "errors": [
        "The status field must be one of: active, inactive, pending_approval.",
        "The integration type field must be one of: api, webhook, email, ftp, manual."
    ]
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/admin/suppliers

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

status   string  optional  

optional Filter suppliers by status (active, inactive, pending_approval). Example: active

integration_type   string  optional  

optional Filter by integration type (api, webhook, email, ftp, manual). Example: api

search   string  optional  

optional Search suppliers by name, company name, or email. Example: Tech

country   string  optional  

optional Filter suppliers by country code. Example: GB

page   integer  optional  

optional Page number for pagination. Default: 1. Example: 1

per_page   integer  optional  

optional Number of suppliers per page (max 50). Default: 15. Example: 20

Body Parameters

status   string  optional  

Example: inactive

Must be one of:
  • active
  • inactive
  • pending_approval
  • suspended
  • terminated
integration_type   string  optional  

Example: ftp

Must be one of:
  • api
  • email
  • webhook
  • ftp
  • csv_upload
  • manual
search   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: b

country   string  optional  

Must be 2 characters. Example: ng

auto_fulfill   boolean  optional  

Example: true

stock_sync_enabled   boolean  optional  

Example: true

price_sync_enabled   boolean  optional  

Example: true

page   integer  optional  

Must be at least 1. Example: 66

per_page   integer  optional  

Must be at least 1. Must not be greater than 100. Example: 17

sort_by   string  optional  

Example: processing_time_days

Must be one of:
  • name
  • created_at
  • last_sync_at
  • processing_time_days
sort_direction   string  optional  

Example: desc

Must be one of:
  • asc
  • desc

Create a new supplier

requires authentication

Create a new supplier with integration configuration. The supplier will initially be set to pending approval status unless auto-approval is enabled. All monetary values should be provided in decimal format.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/suppliers" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"name\": \"TechSupplier Pro\",
    \"company_name\": \"TechSupplier Pro Ltd\",
    \"email\": \"orders@techsupplier.com\",
    \"phone\": \"+44 20 1234 5678\",
    \"address\": \"123 Tech Street, London, E1 6AN\",
    \"country\": \"GB\",
    \"contact_person\": \"John Smith\",
    \"status\": \"active\",
    \"integration_type\": \"api\",
    \"commission_rate\": \"5.50\",
    \"processing_time_days\": 2,
    \"shipping_methods\": [
        \"standard\",
        \"express\"
    ],
    \"api_endpoint\": \"https:\\/\\/api.techsupplier.com\\/v1\",
    \"api_key\": \"ts_live_key_123456789\",
    \"webhook_url\": \"https:\\/\\/techsupplier.com\\/webhooks\",
    \"notes\": \"Reliable supplier with fast shipping\",
    \"auto_fulfill\": true,
    \"stock_sync_enabled\": true,
    \"price_sync_enabled\": false,
    \"minimum_order_value\": \"25.00\",
    \"maximum_order_value\": \"5000.00\",
    \"supported_countries\": [
        \"GB\",
        \"IE\",
        \"FR\"
    ]
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/suppliers"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "name": "TechSupplier Pro",
    "company_name": "TechSupplier Pro Ltd",
    "email": "orders@techsupplier.com",
    "phone": "+44 20 1234 5678",
    "address": "123 Tech Street, London, E1 6AN",
    "country": "GB",
    "contact_person": "John Smith",
    "status": "active",
    "integration_type": "api",
    "commission_rate": "5.50",
    "processing_time_days": 2,
    "shipping_methods": [
        "standard",
        "express"
    ],
    "api_endpoint": "https:\/\/api.techsupplier.com\/v1",
    "api_key": "ts_live_key_123456789",
    "webhook_url": "https:\/\/techsupplier.com\/webhooks",
    "notes": "Reliable supplier with fast shipping",
    "auto_fulfill": true,
    "stock_sync_enabled": true,
    "price_sync_enabled": false,
    "minimum_order_value": "25.00",
    "maximum_order_value": "5000.00",
    "supported_countries": [
        "GB",
        "IE",
        "FR"
    ]
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/suppliers';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'name' => 'TechSupplier Pro',
            'company_name' => 'TechSupplier Pro Ltd',
            'email' => 'orders@techsupplier.com',
            'phone' => '+44 20 1234 5678',
            'address' => '123 Tech Street, London, E1 6AN',
            'country' => 'GB',
            'contact_person' => 'John Smith',
            'status' => 'active',
            'integration_type' => 'api',
            'commission_rate' => '5.50',
            'processing_time_days' => 2,
            'shipping_methods' => [
                'standard',
                'express',
            ],
            'api_endpoint' => 'https://api.techsupplier.com/v1',
            'api_key' => 'ts_live_key_123456789',
            'webhook_url' => 'https://techsupplier.com/webhooks',
            'notes' => 'Reliable supplier with fast shipping',
            'auto_fulfill' => true,
            'stock_sync_enabled' => true,
            'price_sync_enabled' => false,
            'minimum_order_value' => '25.00',
            'maximum_order_value' => '5000.00',
            'supported_countries' => [
                'GB',
                'IE',
                'FR',
            ],
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/suppliers'
payload = {
    "name": "TechSupplier Pro",
    "company_name": "TechSupplier Pro Ltd",
    "email": "orders@techsupplier.com",
    "phone": "+44 20 1234 5678",
    "address": "123 Tech Street, London, E1 6AN",
    "country": "GB",
    "contact_person": "John Smith",
    "status": "active",
    "integration_type": "api",
    "commission_rate": "5.50",
    "processing_time_days": 2,
    "shipping_methods": [
        "standard",
        "express"
    ],
    "api_endpoint": "https:\/\/api.techsupplier.com\/v1",
    "api_key": "ts_live_key_123456789",
    "webhook_url": "https:\/\/techsupplier.com\/webhooks",
    "notes": "Reliable supplier with fast shipping",
    "auto_fulfill": true,
    "stock_sync_enabled": true,
    "price_sync_enabled": false,
    "minimum_order_value": "25.00",
    "maximum_order_value": "5000.00",
    "supported_countries": [
        "GB",
        "IE",
        "FR"
    ]
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()

Example response (200, Supplier created successfully):

    "message": "Supplier created successfully.",
    "data": {
        "id": 7,
        "name": "TechSupplier Pro",
        "company_name": "TechSupplier Pro Ltd",
        "email": "orders@techsupplier.com",
        "phone": "+44 20 1234 5678",
        "address": "123 Tech Street, London, E1 6AN",
        "country": "GB",
        "contact_person": "John Smith",
        "status": "pending_approval",
        "integration_type": "api",
        "commission_rate": 5.5,
        "processing_time_days": 2,
        "auto_fulfill": true,
        "stock_sync_enabled": true,
        "price_sync_enabled": false,
        "minimum_order_value": 25,
        "maximum_order_value": 5000,
        "supported_countries": [
            "GB",
            "IE",
            "FR"
        ],
        "supplier_products_count": 0,
        "dropship_orders_count": 0,
        "created_at": "2025-01-15T16:30:00.000000Z",
        "updated_at": "2025-01-15T16:30:00.000000Z"
    }
}

Example response (403, Insufficient permissions):


{
    "message": "You do not have the required permissions."
}

Example response (409, Supplier already exists):


{
    "message": "A supplier with this email address already exists."
}

Example response (422, Validation errors):


{
    "errors": [
        "The name field is required.",
        "The email field must be a valid email address.",
        "The integration type field must be one of: api, webhook, email, ftp, manual.",
        "The commission rate may not be greater than 100."
    ]
}

Example response (500, Server error):


{
    "message": "Failed to create supplier."
}

Request      

POST api/admin/suppliers

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

name   string   

The supplier's display name. Example: TechSupplier Pro

company_name   string   

The official company name. Example: TechSupplier Pro Ltd

email   string   

The supplier's contact email address. Example: orders@techsupplier.com

phone   string  optional  

optional The supplier's phone number. Example: +44 20 1234 5678

address   string  optional  

optional The supplier's physical address. Example: 123 Tech Street, London, E1 6AN

country   string   

ISO country code. Example: GB

contact_person   string  optional  

optional Primary contact person name. Example: John Smith

status   string  optional  

optional Initial status (active, inactive, pending_approval). Default: pending_approval. Example: active

integration_type   string   

Integration method (api, webhook, email, ftp, manual). Example: api

commission_rate   numeric  optional  

optional Commission rate percentage. Example: 5.50

processing_time_days   integer  optional  

optional Processing time in days. Example: 2

shipping_methods   string[]  optional  

optional Supported shipping methods.

integration_config   object  optional  
api_endpoint   string  optional  

optional API endpoint URL for API integrations. Example: https://api.techsupplier.com/v1

api_key   string  optional  

optional API key for authentication. Example: ts_live_key_123456789

webhook_url   string  optional  

optional Webhook URL for status updates. Example: https://techsupplier.com/webhooks

notes   string  optional  

optional Additional notes about the supplier. Example: Reliable supplier with fast shipping

auto_fulfill   boolean  optional  

optional Enable automatic order fulfillment. Example: true

stock_sync_enabled   boolean  optional  

optional Enable automatic stock synchronization. Example: true

price_sync_enabled   boolean  optional  

optional Enable automatic price synchronization. Example: false

minimum_order_value   numeric  optional  

optional Minimum order value in pounds. Example: 25.00

maximum_order_value   numeric  optional  

optional Maximum order value in pounds. Example: 5000.00

supported_countries   string[]  optional  

optional Array of supported country codes.

Retrieve a specific supplier

requires authentication

Get detailed information about a specific supplier including related products, recent orders, and integration configurations. This endpoint provides comprehensive supplier analytics.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/suppliers/16" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/suppliers/16"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/suppliers/16';
$response = $client->get(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/suppliers/16'
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('GET', url, headers=headers)
response.json()

Request      

GET api/admin/suppliers/{id}

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

id   integer   

The ID of the supplier. Example: 16

supplier   integer   

The ID of the supplier to retrieve. Example: 1

Delete a supplier

requires authentication

Soft delete a supplier after validating that there are no active dependencies. The supplier will be hidden from normal queries but preserved for audit purposes.

Example request:
curl --request DELETE \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/suppliers/16" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/suppliers/16"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "DELETE",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/suppliers/16';
$response = $client->delete(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/suppliers/16'
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('DELETE', url, headers=headers)
response.json()

Example response (200, Supplier deleted successfully):


{
    "message": "Supplier deleted successfully."
}

Example response (400, Cannot delete - has active dependencies):


{
    "message": "Cannot delete supplier with active dropship orders."
}

Example response (400, Cannot delete - has active mappings):


{
    "message": "Cannot delete supplier with active product mappings. Deactivate mappings first."
}

Example response (403, Insufficient permissions):


{
    "message": "You do not have the required permissions."
}

Example response (404, Supplier not found):


{
    "message": "No query results for model [App\\Models\\Supplier] 999"
}

Example response (500, Server error):


{
    "message": "Failed to delete supplier."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

URL Parameters

The ID of the supplier. Example: 16

supplier   integer   

The ID of the supplier to delete. Example: 1

Activate a supplier

requires authentication

Change supplier status to active, enabling order processing and integration workflows. This action may trigger automatic product syncing if configured.

Example request:
curl --request PATCH \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/suppliers/16/activate" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/suppliers/16/activate"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "PATCH",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/suppliers/16/activate';
$response = $client->patch(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/suppliers/16/activate'
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('PATCH', url, headers=headers)
response.json()

Example response (200, Supplier activated successfully):


{
    "message": "Supplier activated successfully.",
    "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "GlobalTech Distributors",
        "status": "active",
        "updated_at": "2025-01-15T18:00:00.000000Z"
    }
}

Deactivate a supplier

requires authentication

Change supplier status to inactive, disabling new order processing while preserving existing data and relationships. Active orders will continue to be processed.

Example request:
curl --request PATCH \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/suppliers/16/deactivate" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"

    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/suppliers/16/deactivate"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

    method: "PATCH",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());

$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/suppliers/16/deactivate';

    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);

print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

Get supplier statistics and analytics

requires authentication

Retrieve comprehensive performance statistics for a supplier including health metrics, fulfillment performance, integration status, and recent order analytics.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/suppliers/16/stats" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/suppliers/16/stats"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/suppliers/16/stats';
$response = $client->get(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));

Test supplier connection

requires authentication

Test the connection to the supplier's integration endpoint to verify configuration and connectivity. This helps diagnose integration issues and validate setup.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/suppliers/16/test-connection" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/suppliers/16/test-connection"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/suppliers/16/test-connection';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response.json()

{
    "message": "Connection test completed.",
    "data": {
        "success": true,
        "response_time": 145,
        "status_code": 200,
        "integration_type": "api",
        "endpoint": "https://api.globaltech-dist.com/v1/test",
        "message": "Connection successful"
    }
}

Example response (200, Connection test failed):


{
    "message": "Connection test completed.",
    "data": {
        "success": false,
        "response_time": null,
        "status_code": null,
        "integration_type": "api",
        "endpoint": "https://api.globaltech-dist.com/v1/test",
        "message": "Connection timeout"
    }
}

    "message": "No active integration found for this supplier."
}

    "message": "You do not have the required permissions."

Supplier Products

Retrieve paginated list of supplier products

requires authentication

Get a paginated list of all supplier products in the system. This endpoint supports filtering by supplier, sync status, active status, mapping status, and stock levels. Includes product sync information and mapping details.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/supplier-products?supplier_id=1&sync_status=synced&is_active=1&is_mapped=1&search=Wireless&stock_status=in_stock&page=1&per_page=20" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"sync_status\": \"out_of_sync\",
    \"is_active\": true,
    \"is_mapped\": false,
    \"search\": \"b\",
    \"stock_status\": \"in_stock\",
    \"category\": \"n\",
    \"min_price\": 84,
    \"max_price\": 12,
    \"min_stock\": 77,
    \"max_stock\": 8,
    \"last_synced_from\": \"2025-07-21T08:45:17\",
    \"last_synced_to\": \"2051-08-14\",
    \"page\": 22,
    \"per_page\": 7,
    \"sort_by\": \"created_at\",
    \"sort_direction\": \"desc\",
    \"include_images\": true,
    \"include_attributes\": true
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/supplier-products"
);

const params = {
    "supplier_id": "1",
    "sync_status": "synced",
    "is_active": "1",
    "is_mapped": "1",
    "search": "Wireless",
    "stock_status": "in_stock",
    "page": "1",
    "per_page": "20",
};
Object.keys(params)
    .forEach(key => url.searchParams.append(key, params[key]));

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "sync_status": "out_of_sync",
    "is_active": true,
    "is_mapped": false,
    "search": "b",
    "stock_status": "in_stock",
    "category": "n",
    "min_price": 84,
    "max_price": 12,
    "min_stock": 77,
    "max_stock": 8,
    "last_synced_from": "2025-07-21T08:45:17",
    "last_synced_to": "2051-08-14",
    "page": 22,
    "per_page": 7,
    "sort_by": "created_at",
    "sort_direction": "desc",
    "include_images": true,
    "include_attributes": true
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/supplier-products';
$response = $client->get(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'query' => [
            'supplier_id' => '1',
            'sync_status' => 'synced',
            'is_active' => '1',
            'is_mapped' => '1',
            'search' => 'Wireless',
            'stock_status' => 'in_stock',
            'page' => '1',
            'per_page' => '20',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'sync_status' => 'out_of_sync',
            'is_active' => true,
            'is_mapped' => false,
            'search' => 'b',
            'stock_status' => 'in_stock',
            'category' => 'n',
            'min_price' => 84,
            'max_price' => 12,
            'min_stock' => 77,
            'max_stock' => 8,
            'last_synced_from' => '2025-07-21T08:45:17',
            'last_synced_to' => '2051-08-14',
            'page' => 22,
            'per_page' => 7,
            'sort_by' => 'created_at',
            'sort_direction' => 'desc',
            'include_images' => true,
            'include_attributes' => true,
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/supplier-products'
payload = {
    "sync_status": "out_of_sync",
    "is_active": true,
    "is_mapped": false,
    "search": "b",
    "stock_status": "in_stock",
    "category": "n",
    "min_price": 84,
    "max_price": 12,
    "min_stock": 77,
    "max_stock": 8,
    "last_synced_from": "2025-07-21T08:45:17",
    "last_synced_to": "2051-08-14",
    "page": 22,
    "per_page": 7,
    "sort_by": "created_at",
    "sort_direction": "desc",
    "include_images": true,
    "include_attributes": true
}
params = {
  'supplier_id': '1',
  'sync_status': 'synced',
  'is_active': '1',
  'is_mapped': '1',
  'search': 'Wireless',
  'stock_status': 'in_stock',
  'page': '1',
  'per_page': '20',
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('GET', url, headers=headers, json=payload, params=params)
response.json()

Example response (200, Success with products):


{
    "message": "Supplier products retrieved successfully.",
    "data": {
        "data": [
            {
                "id": 1,
                "supplier_id": 1,
                "supplier_sku": "GT-WH-001",
                "supplier_product_id": "GT001",
                "name": "Wireless Bluetooth Headphones Pro",
                "description": "Premium noise-cancelling wireless headphones with 30-hour battery life",
                "supplier_price": 4500,
                "supplier_price_formatted": "£45.00",
                "retail_price": 7999,
                "retail_price_formatted": "£79.99",
                "stock_quantity": 150,
                "weight": 0.35,
                "length": 20,
                "width": 18,
                "height": 8,
                "sync_status": "synced",
                "is_active": true,
                "is_mapped": true,
                "minimum_order_quantity": 1,
                "processing_time_days": 2,
                "images": [
                    "headphones-1.jpg",
                    "headphones-2.jpg"
                ],
                "attributes": {
                    "color": "Black",
                    "connectivity": "Bluetooth 5.0"
                },
                "categories": [
                    "Electronics",
                    "Audio"
                ],
                "last_synced_at": "2025-01-15T14:30:00.000000Z",
                "supplier": {
                    "id": 1,
                    "name": "GlobalTech Distributors",
                    "status": "active"
                },
                "product": {
                    "id": 25,
                    "name": "Wireless Bluetooth Headphones Pro",
                    "price": 7999
                },
                "created_at": "2025-01-10T08:00:00.000000Z",
                "updated_at": "2025-01-15T14:30:00.000000Z"
            }
        ],
        "current_page": 1,
        "per_page": 15,
        "total": 23,
        "last_page": 2,
        "from": 1,
        "to": 15
    }
}

Example response (200, No products found):


{
    "message": "Supplier products retrieved successfully.",
    "data": {
        "data": [],
        "current_page": 1,
        "per_page": 15,
        "total": 0,
        "last_page": 1,
        "from": null,
        "to": null
    }
}

Example response (403, Insufficient permissions):


{
    "message": "You do not have the required permissions."
}

Example response (422, Invalid filter parameters):


{
    "errors": [
        "The supplier id field must be an integer.",
        "The sync status field must be one of: synced, pending_sync, out_of_sync, sync_error."
    ]
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

GET api/admin/supplier-products

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Query Parameters

supplier_id   integer  optional  

optional Filter products by specific supplier ID. Example: 1

sync_status   string  optional  

optional Filter by sync status (synced, pending_sync, out_of_sync, sync_error). Example: synced

is_active   boolean  optional  

optional Filter by active status (1 for active, 0 for inactive). Example: true

is_mapped   boolean  optional  

optional Filter by mapping status (1 for mapped, 0 for unmapped). Example: true

search   string  optional  

optional Search products by name, supplier SKU, or supplier product ID. Example: Wireless

stock_status   string  optional  

optional Filter by stock status (in_stock, out_of_stock, low_stock). Example: in_stock

page   integer  optional  

optional Page number for pagination. Default: 1. Example: 1

per_page   integer  optional  

optional Number of products per page (max 50). Default: 15. Example: 20

Body Parameters

supplier_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the suppliers table.

sync_status   string  optional  

Example: out_of_sync

Must be one of:
  • synced
  • pending_sync
  • sync_failed
  • out_of_sync
  • supplier_discontinued
is_active   boolean  optional  

Example: true

is_mapped   boolean  optional  

Example: false

search   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: b

stock_status   string  optional  

Example: in_stock

Must be one of:
  • in_stock
  • out_of_stock
  • low_stock
category   string  optional  

Must not be greater than 255 characters. Example: n

min_price   number  optional  

Must be at least 0. Example: 84

max_price   number  optional  

Must be at least 0. Example: 12

min_stock   integer  optional  

Must be at least 0. Example: 77

max_stock   integer  optional  

Must be at least 0. Example: 8

last_synced_from   string  optional  

Must be a valid date. Example: 2025-07-21T08:45:17

last_synced_to   string  optional  

Must be a valid date. Must be a date after or equal to last_synced_from. Example: 2051-08-14

page   integer  optional  

Must be at least 1. Example: 22

per_page   integer  optional  

Must be at least 1. Must not be greater than 100. Example: 7

sort_by   string  optional  

Example: created_at

Must be one of:
  • name
  • supplier_sku
  • supplier_price
  • retail_price
  • stock_quantity
  • last_synced_at
  • created_at
sort_direction   string  optional  

Example: desc

Must be one of:
  • asc
  • desc
include_images   boolean  optional  

Example: true

include_attributes   boolean  optional  

Example: true

Create a new supplier product

requires authentication

Create a new product entry from a supplier catalog. This creates a supplier product record that can later be mapped to store products. All monetary values should be provided in pennies.

Example request:
curl --request POST \
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/supplier-products" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json" \
    --data "{
    \"supplier_id\": 1,
    \"supplier_sku\": \"GT-WH-001\",
    \"supplier_product_id\": \"GT001\",
    \"name\": \"Wireless Bluetooth Headphones Pro\",
    \"description\": \"Premium noise-cancelling wireless headphones\",
    \"supplier_price\": 4500,
    \"retail_price\": 7999,
    \"stock_quantity\": 150,
    \"weight\": \"0.35\",
    \"length\": \"20.0\",
    \"width\": \"18.0\",
    \"height\": \"8.0\",
    \"sync_status\": \"synced\",
    \"images\": [
        \"image1.jpg\",
        \"image2.jpg\"
    ],
    \"attributes\": {
        \"color\": \"Black\",
        \"connectivity\": \"Bluetooth 5.0\"
    },
    \"categories\": [
        \"Electronics\",
        \"Audio\"
    ],
    \"is_active\": true,
    \"is_mapped\": true,
    \"minimum_order_quantity\": 1,
    \"processing_time_days\": 2
}"

const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/supplier-products"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

let body = {
    "supplier_id": 1,
    "supplier_sku": "GT-WH-001",
    "supplier_product_id": "GT001",
    "name": "Wireless Bluetooth Headphones Pro",
    "description": "Premium noise-cancelling wireless headphones",
    "supplier_price": 4500,
    "retail_price": 7999,
    "stock_quantity": 150,
    "weight": "0.35",
    "length": "20.0",
    "width": "18.0",
    "height": "8.0",
    "sync_status": "synced",
    "images": [
        "image1.jpg",
        "image2.jpg"
    ],
    "attributes": {
        "color": "Black",
        "connectivity": "Bluetooth 5.0"
    },
    "categories": [
        "Electronics",
        "Audio"
    ],
    "is_active": true,
    "is_mapped": true,
    "minimum_order_quantity": 1,
    "processing_time_days": 2
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "POST",
    headers,
    body: JSON.stringify(body),
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/supplier-products';
$response = $client->post(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
        'json' => [
            'supplier_id' => 1,
            'supplier_sku' => 'GT-WH-001',
            'supplier_product_id' => 'GT001',
            'name' => 'Wireless Bluetooth Headphones Pro',
            'description' => 'Premium noise-cancelling wireless headphones',
            'supplier_price' => 4500,
            'retail_price' => 7999,
            'stock_quantity' => 150,
            'weight' => '0.35',
            'length' => '20.0',
            'width' => '18.0',
            'height' => '8.0',
            'sync_status' => 'synced',
            'images' => [
                'image1.jpg',
                'image2.jpg',
            ],
            'attributes' => [
                'color' => 'Black',
                'connectivity' => 'Bluetooth 5.0',
            ],
            'categories' => [
                'Electronics',
                'Audio',
            ],
            'is_active' => true,
            'is_mapped' => true,
            'minimum_order_quantity' => 1,
            'processing_time_days' => 2,
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/supplier-products'
payload = {
    "supplier_id": 1,
    "supplier_sku": "GT-WH-001",
    "supplier_product_id": "GT001",
    "name": "Wireless Bluetooth Headphones Pro",
    "description": "Premium noise-cancelling wireless headphones",
    "supplier_price": 4500,
    "retail_price": 7999,
    "stock_quantity": 150,
    "weight": "0.35",
    "length": "20.0",
    "width": "18.0",
    "height": "8.0",
    "sync_status": "synced",
    "images": [
        "image1.jpg",
        "image2.jpg"
    ],
    "attributes": {
        "color": "Black",
        "connectivity": "Bluetooth 5.0"
    },
    "categories": [
        "Electronics",
        "Audio"
    ],
    "is_active": true,
    "is_mapped": true,
    "minimum_order_quantity": 1,
    "processing_time_days": 2
}
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('POST', url, headers=headers, json=payload)
response.json()

Example response (200, Product created successfully):


{
    "message": "Supplier product created successfully.",
    "data": {
        "id": 24,
        "supplier_id": 1,
        "supplier_sku": "GT-WH-001",
        "supplier_product_id": "GT001",
        "name": "Wireless Bluetooth Headphones Pro",
        "description": "Premium noise-cancelling wireless headphones",
        "supplier_price": 4500,
        "supplier_price_formatted": "£45.00",
        "retail_price": 7999,
        "retail_price_formatted": "£79.99",
        "stock_quantity": 150,
        "weight": 0.35,
        "sync_status": "synced",
        "is_active": true,
        "is_mapped": false,
        "minimum_order_quantity": 1,
        "processing_time_days": 2,
        "images": [
            "image1.jpg",
            "image2.jpg"
        ],
        "attributes": {
            "color": "Black",
            "connectivity": "Bluetooth 5.0"
        },
        "categories": [
            "Electronics",
            "Audio"
        ],
        "supplier": {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "GlobalTech Distributors"
        },
        "product": null,
        "created_at": "2025-01-15T20:00:00.000000Z",
        "updated_at": "2025-01-15T20:00:00.000000Z"
    }
}

Example response (403, Insufficient permissions):


{
    "message": "You do not have the required permissions."
}

Example response (409, Duplicate SKU):


{
    "message": "A product with this supplier SKU already exists for this supplier."
}

Example response (422, Validation errors):


{
    "errors": [
        "The supplier id field is required.",
        "The supplier sku field is required.",
        "The name field is required.",
        "The supplier price must be greater than 0."
    ]
}

Example response (500, Server error):


{
    "message": "Failed to create supplier product."
}
Received response:
Request failed with error:


Tip: Check that you're properly connected to the network.
If you're a maintainer of ths API, verify that your API is running and you've enabled CORS.
You can check the Dev Tools console for debugging information.

Request      

POST api/admin/supplier-products

Headers

Authorization      

Example: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}

Content-Type      

Example: application/json

Accept      

Example: application/json

Body Parameters

supplier_id   integer   

The ID of the supplier for this product. Example: 1

product_id   string  optional  

The id of an existing record in the products table.

supplier_sku   string   

The supplier's SKU/part number. Example: GT-WH-001

supplier_product_id   string   

The supplier's internal product ID. Example: GT001

name   string   

The product name from supplier catalog. Example: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones Pro

description   string  optional  

optional Product description from supplier. Example: Premium noise-cancelling wireless headphones

supplier_price   integer   

Supplier wholesale price in pennies. Example: 4500

retail_price   integer  optional  

optional Suggested retail price in pennies. Example: 7999

stock_quantity   integer   

Current stock quantity. Example: 150

weight   numeric  optional  

optional Product weight in kg. Example: 0.35

length   numeric  optional  

optional Product length in cm. Example: 20.0

width   numeric  optional  

optional Product width in cm. Example: 18.0

height   numeric  optional  

optional Product height in cm. Example: 8.0

sync_status   string  optional  

optional Sync status (synced, pending_sync, out_of_sync, sync_error). Default: pending_sync. Example: synced

images   string[]  optional  

optional Array of product image URLs.

attributes   object  optional  

optional Product attributes as key-value pairs.

categories   string[]  optional  

optional Product categories.

is_active   boolean  optional  

optional Whether the product is active. Default: true. Example: true

is_mapped   boolean  optional  

Example: true

minimum_order_quantity   integer  optional  

optional Minimum order quantity. Default: 1. Example: 1

processing_time_days   integer  optional  

optional Processing time in days. Example: 2

Retrieve a specific supplier product

requires authentication

Get detailed information about a specific supplier product including mapping information, recent dropship order items, and sync history. This provides a comprehensive view of the product's performance and relationships.

Example request:
curl --request GET \
    --get "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/supplier-products/16" \
    --header "Authorization: Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}" \
    --header "Content-Type: application/json" \
    --header "Accept: application/json"
const url = new URL(
    "http://marketplace.com/api/admin/supplier-products/16"
);

const headers = {
    "Authorization": "Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "application/json",
};

fetch(url, {
    method: "GET",
    headers,
}).then(response => response.json());
$client = new \GuzzleHttp\Client();
$url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/supplier-products/16';
$response = $client->get(
    $url,
    [
        'headers' => [
            'Authorization' => 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
            'Content-Type' => 'application/json',
            'Accept' => 'application/json',
        ],
    ]
);
$body = $response->getBody();
print_r(json_decode((string) $body));
import requests
import json

url = 'http://marketplace.com/api/admin/supplier-products/16'
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer {YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN}',
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Accept': 'application/json'
}

response = requests.request('GET', url, headers=headers)
response.json()

    "message": "Supplier product retrieved successfully.",
    "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "supplier_id": 1,
        "supplier_sku": "GT-WH-001",
        "supplier_product_id": "GT001",
        "name": "Wireless Bluetooth Headphones Pro",
        "description": "Premium noise-cancelling wireless headphones with 30-hour battery life",
        "supplier_price": 4500,
        "supplier_price_formatted": "£45.00",
        "retail_price": 7999,
        "retail_price_formatted": "£79.99",
        "stock_quantity": 150,
        "weight": 0.35,
        "length": 20,
        "width": 18,
        "height": 8,
        "sync_status": "synced",
        "is_active": true,
        "is_mapped": true,
        "minimum_order_quantity": 1,
        "processing_time_days": 2,
        "images": [
            "headphones-1.jpg",
            "headphones-2.jpg"
        ],
        "attributes": {
            "color": "Black",
            "connectivity": "Bluetooth 5.0"
        },
        "categories": [
            "Electronics",
            "Audio"
        ],
        "sync_errors": null,
        "last_synced_at": "2025-01-15T14:30:00.000000Z",
        "supplier": {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "GlobalTech Distributors",
            "status": "active",
            "integration_type": "api"
        },
        "product": {
            "id": 25,
            "name": "Wireless Bluetooth Headphones Pro",
            "price": 7999,
            "vendor": {
                "id": 1,
                "name": "Tech Haven"
            }
        },
        "product_mapping": {
            "id": 1,
            "is_primary": true,
            "is_active": true,

                "id": 1,
                "quantity": 2,
                "supplier_price": 4500,
                "retail_price": 7999,
                "created_at": "2025-01-15T16:20:00.000000Z",
                "dropship_order": {
                    "id": 1,
                    "status": "confirmed",
                    "order": {
                        "id": 98,
                        "user": {
                            "name": "Customer Name"
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        ],
        "created_at": "2025-01-10T08:00:00.000000Z",
        "updated_at": "2025-01-15T14:30:00.000000Z"
    }
}

Example response (403, Insufficient permissions):


{
    "message": "You do not have the required permissions."
}

Example response (404, Product not found):

    "message": "No query results for model [App\\Models\\SupplierProduct] 999"
}
